CODECHEF - VIT.name: CookOff 10.0
CODECHEF - VIT.description:
In Competitive Coding, logic reigns supreme. Algorithms can be learned, but true brilliance lies in raw, simple logic.

Welcome to CookOff 10.0 – the legendary coding arena of graVITas. For a decade, it has tested skill, speed, and creativity, celebrating problem-solving, where innovation meets determination.

Whether you’re a seasoned coder or a beginner ready to shine, this is your stage. Step into the Colosseum of Creativity, where every line of code takes you closer to victory.

This is more than a contest, it’s a tradition, a legacy. Now, it’s your moment.

Are you ready to code your way to greatness?
CODECHEF - VIT.short_description: Step into the longest-running competitive coding event at graVITas! CookOff is back with its 10th edition. More than just algorithms and data structures, it’s a test of pure logic, problem-solving, and creativity. Whether you’re a coding veteran or a rising talent, this is your chance to challenge limits, showcase skills, and compete with sharpest minds. Be part of the legacy.

CODECHEF - VIT.name: Clueminati 3.0
CODECHEF - VIT.description:
Every tale of survival begins with loss. A fellowship is torn apart - some dragged into Hell, others left on Earth, desperate to bring them back. The living hunt for clues, while the damned confronts cryptic trials, both inching toward a single truth: salvation is impossible without sacrifice.

A final trial awaits - one that will test wit, unity, and resolve. Only the strongest will rise from the flame; the rest will remain bound in darkness.

Do you have what it takes to bring your friends Back to Life?
CODECHEF - VIT.short_description: Clueminati is back with its third edition and this time, the treasure hunt is full of secrets, twists, and surprises at every turn. Teams will be split, mysteries will unfold, and only the cleverest will escape unscathed. Will you uncover the mysteries, outsmart the trials, and rise victorious? Step in... if you dare.
CODECHEF - VIT.tagline: Face The Flames, Revive or Remain.

COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).name: LaserTag
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).description:
LaserTag is an electrifying 5v5 arena game that puts you and your team in a fast-paced battle to score the most points. Armed with high-tech laser guns, you’ll face off against opponents in a glowing battlefield filled with UV lights, lasers, and vibrant artwork that bring the arena to life. Every corner is designed to heighten the thrill, blending strategy, speed, and accuracy in a truly immersive experience.

The game is completely safe and beginner-friendly, making it perfect for first-timers while still delivering the adrenaline rush that seasoned players crave. With every shot fired and every point earned, the energy builds, keeping you on edge and fully engaged until the last second.

Whether you’re here to compete with friends, test your reflexes, or just enjoy the glow of lasers lighting up the arena, LaserTag guarantees a fun, competitive, and unforgettable adventure. Step inside, gear up, and get ready for a battle that’s as safe as it is exhilarating.
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).short_description: LaserTag is a thrilling 5v5 arena game where you race to score the most points with laser guns against opponents. Surrounded by glowing UV lights, lasers, and vibrant artwork, the arena creates a fun, competitive vibe. Safe, beginner-friendly, and adrenaline-packed, it’s an experience you won’t forget. Step in, gear up, and let the battle begin!
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).tagline: ‘The grid never sleeps , the lights never die’

COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).name: ForkThis
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).description:
ForkThis is CSI-VIT’s flagship open-source workshop conducted by CSI core members. It focuses on Git and GitHub through theory, demos, and real-life implementation. The event includes an industry expert session on open source. 
 After the workshop, a 2-day online competition will be held featuring bug-fix projects, a live leaderboard, and exciting prize money for the top performers.
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).short_description: ForkThis is CSI-VIT’s flagship workshop on Git and GitHub, featuring an expert session and a 2-day online competition.

COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).name: BattleCode
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).description: BattleCode is a fast-paced competitive coding event packed with unique challenges.You’ll take on real opponents in head-to-head battles, race against the clock, and tackle rounds that test both your logic and strategy. Every stage brings a new twist, keeping you on your toes until the very end.
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).short_description: BattleCode is a fast-paced coding event where you'll face opponents in head-to-head battles. Each stage introduces a new strategic twist, testing your skills until the very end.
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).tagline: Code. Clash. Conquer. - Outsmart the battlefield, one algorithm at a time!

COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).name: Cicada 3300
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).description: CICADA 3300 is a mystery-filled competition where you solve puzzles, crack codes, and uncover hidden clues. From ciphers and visual tricks to logic and memory challenges, every stage takes you deeper into the unknown. It’s not just about solving problems, but about discovering what lies beyond them. You weren’t meant to find this, You were meant to awaken. Matrix te tenet — nisi te ipsum perdas.
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).short_description: CICADA 3300 is a mystery-filled competition where you solve puzzles , ciphers ,  crack codes, and uncover hidden clues  pushing your logic, memory, and curiosity deeper into the unknown.
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).tagline: The glitch wasn’t a mistake, it was a message.

COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).name: HackBattle
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).description:
HackBattle, organized by IEEE Computer Society (IEEE CS), is a dynamic 36-hour hackathon designed to bring together the brightest innovators, passionate creators, and determined problem-solvers under one roof. It is more than just a coding marathon; it is a transformative journey where participants push the boundaries of creativity, technology, and teamwork.
Over the course of a thrilling overnight experience, students and professionals alike will work tirelessly to turn ideas into reality, tackling carefully curated real-world problem statements that demand innovative thinking and practical solutions. Teams will ideate, design, and build projects that not only demonstrate technical excellence but also create meaningful impact in society.
What sets HackBattle apart is its blend of competition and collaboration. While teams strive to outshine each other with their projects, the event fosters a supportive ecosystem where learning and knowledge-sharing are equally valued. Participants will have the opportunity to interact with mentors, industry leaders, and experts, gaining insights into emerging technologies, best practices, and career growth in the tech landscape.
The event is structured to ensure that creativity is matched with guidance and exposure. Alongside the hackathon, participants can attend exclusive workshops, tech talks, and panel discussions led by professionals who bring real-world experience to the table. These sessions not only help participants strengthen their technical skills but also inspire them to think bigger and bolder.
HackBattle is also a networking platform where aspiring innovators connect with like-minded peers, mentors, and organizations. Whether it is collaborating with teammates, learning from experts, or showcasing projects to potential recruiters and sponsors, participants gain experiences that extend far beyond the 36-hour challenge.
At its core, HackBattle is a celebration of innovation, teamwork, and the unstoppable energy of technology. It is a space where ideas take flight, where persistence meets passion, and where the leaders of tomorrow emerge with solutions that can shape the future.
COMPUTER SOCIETY OF INDIA (CSI).short_description: HackBattle is a dynamic 36-hour hackathon where innovators, creators, and problem-solvers come together to code, collaborate, and compete. This overnight coding marathon is a fast-paced journey of turning ideas into reality, tackling real-world challenges, and building impactful solutions that push creativity and technical skill to the next level. Alongside the competition, participants will enjoy inspiring sessions from industry leaders, offering expert insights, practical guidance, and valuable networking. More than just an event, HackBattle is a vibrant celebration of innovation, teamwork, and the unstoppable energy of technology.

BECOMING I FOUNDATION.name: Kaun Banega Codepati
BECOMING I FOUNDATION.description: Kon Banega Codepati (KBC) is a fun-filled coding + quiz event inspired by the iconic KBC format. With quiz rounds, coding challenges, lifelines, and a buzzer finale, it blends knowledge with entertainment. Open to all batches, KBC ensures collaboration, excitement, and rewards, making it one of Gravitas’ most engaging highlights.
BECOMING I FOUNDATION.short_description: Kon Banega Codepati (KBC) blends quizzes, coding, and buzzer rounds with lifelines, offering fun, collaboration, and excitement across batches.

BECOMING I FOUNDATION.name: Make-A-Smile
BECOMING I FOUNDATION.description: MAKE-A-SMILE is an event by Becoming I Foundation (BIF) at VIT, reimagining our FLAGSHIP EVENT Smile event with an exciting STEM-based twist. Continuing the tradition of spreading joy during Riviera and now extending to Gravitas, this edition blends creativity, learning, and fun in a hands-on environment. In collaboration with local schools, BIF welcomes children to VIT for an inspiring day of teamwork and exploration. Guided by dedicated VIT student volunteers, participants will form small teams to build innovative projects using specially curated STEM kits—creations they can proudly take home. Alongside the technical activities, MAKE-A-SMILE retains the essence original Smile event with games and moments of shared laughter.
BECOMING I FOUNDATION.short_description: MAKE-A-SMILE by Becoming I Foundation (BIF) at VIT reimagines our flagship Smile event with a STEM twist. Extending from Riviera to Gravitas, the event brings local schoolchildren to VIT for a day of creativity, teamwork, and fun. Guided by student volunteers, children will use STEM kits to build projects they can take home, while also enjoying games and the joy that has always defined Smile.

ASSOCIATION FOR COMPUTING MACHINERY (ACM.name: Cryptic Hunt 4.0
ASSOCIATION FOR COMPUTING MACHINERY (ACM.description: VIT’s largest hunt for three years running, Cryptic Hunt 4.0, is back with a new adventure. You will compete in a race against time to scan QR codes hidden throughout the campus, with a live leaderboard tracking your progress. A hunt that’ll test your wit and intelligence, register soon with your team and engage in a high-voltage affair across 36 hours!
ASSOCIATION FOR COMPUTING MACHINERY (ACM.short_description: Cryptic Hunt 4.0 is an unconventional tech-based scavenger hunt where teams solve cryptic puzzles by scanning QR codes. Participants explore the campus and decode ciphers and riddles to climb their way up the leaderboard.

ASSOCIATION FOR COMPUTING MACHINERY (ACM.name: Code2Create 6.0 (C2C)
ASSOCIATION FOR COMPUTING MACHINERY (ACM.description: One of VIT’s oldest legacy hackathons, Code2Create is a flagship 48-hour event where creativity meets skill. With diverse tracks, C2C unites participants to solve real-world challenges, collaborate with peers, and learn from mentors. It’s the stage for innovation and talent, welcoming both beginners and seasoned hackers to build, showcase, and shine at the ultimate hackathon experience.
ASSOCIATION FOR COMPUTING MACHINERY (ACM.short_description: Code2Create 6.0, the grandest hack at VIT, unites innovators to build, learn, and transform bold ideas into reality.
ASSOCIATION FOR COMPUTING MACHINERY (ACM.tagline: Don’t just code for the vibes, Code2Create.

ROBOVITICS.name: Robowars
ROBOVITICS.description: ROBOWARS is the flagship event of graVITas and one of the biggest combat robotics events in India. More than 40 bots of 8kg, 15kg and 60kg engage in thrilling, round-the-clock battles in the largest and safest arena in the country, competing for the championship title with their war machines. It delivers an adrenaline rush to both participants and the audience. Teams from all over the globe gather here to showcase their fighting spirit and strive for glory.
ROBOVITICS.short_description: Robowars, the flagship event of graVITas, is India’s biggest combat robotics arena. With 8kg, 15kg, and 60kg bots battling for glory, it brings global teams, raw power, and nonstop adrenaline to VIT Vellore.
ROBOVITICS.tagline: Forge . Battle . Wreck - The ultimate combat robotics war at Robowars 2025.

ROBOVITICS.name: Hands on Robotics
ROBOVITICS.description:
Hands on Robotics is a two-day premium event organized by RoboVITics, aimed at providing students with a practical and immersive introduction to the fascinating world of robotics. This workshop combines interactive theory sessions with engaging hands-on activities, ensuring that participants not only understand the concepts but also apply them in real time. Guided by experienced speakers and supported by dedicated volunteers, participants will receive step by step assistance throughout the event. This approach ensures a strong foundation in essential robotics principles while fostering active learning and collaboration.

The event is designed to offer an interdisciplinary experience, bringing together elements of electronics, programming, and mechanical design. Participants will embark on a journey to create their own web dashboard-controlled robot, learning to design and develop a custom web interface to control their bot.They will be using websockets, learning IoT to apply communication protocol to control the robot. Alongside this, they will work on building the robot’s physical structure using various tools and components, applying knowledge from multiple domains in a practical and exciting manner. By the end of the event, students will have a complete understanding of the process from concept to execution while gaining valuable skills in working with ESP32, MicroPython, and web technologies.

Hands on Robotics is more than just a workshop; it is an opportunity to innovate, explore, and take the first step toward mastering robotics. It promises a holistic, project-based learning experience that bridges theory and practice, empowering participants to create something extraordinary.
ROBOVITICS.short_description:
Build, code, and command your own robot in just 2 days! 
Hands-On Robotics is a practical, beginner-friendly workshop where you assemble a bot, program it with micropython, and control it in real time via a slick WebSocket web dashboard on your laptop or a mobile phone. Expect bite-sized theory, lots of tinkering, and instant feedback as your bot comes alive. Wrap up with a fun mini-challenge and leave with real skills, a working robot, and confidence to keep creating.
ROBOVITICS.tagline: Robotics Made Easy: Build, Code, Control.

ROBOVITICS.name: GamaLab
ROBOVITICS.description: Gamasome in collaboration with RoboVITics is excited to host a 24-hour AI & Software Development Hackathon at GraVITas ’25, bringing together top student innovators to tackle real-world challenges through cutting-edge software solutions. Teams of two will compete in domains spanning artificial intelligence and software development. After a preliminary shortlisting, participants will tackle a problem statement unveiled at the start of the event, working intensively to deliver impactful & innovative solutions.Winners stand to earn cash prizes, goodies, and exclusive 6-month paid internships at Gamasome. This hackathon blends innovation, teamwork, and opportunity, forging the next generation of AI talent.
ROBOVITICS.short_description: Gamasome, in collaboration with RoboVITics, is hosting a 24-hour AI & Software Development Hackathon at GraVITas ’25. Teams of two will compete on real-world challenges in AI and software, with problem statements revealed at the start.. Winners will receive cash prizes, goodies, and exclusive 6-month paid internships at Gamasome. This hackathon is a platform for innovation, teamwork, and shaping the next generation of AI talent. Participation is restricted to final year BTech students

ROBOVITICS.name: NeuroHack
ROBOVITICS.description:
Neuralzome, in collaboration with RoboVITics, is hosting a 24-hour AI & Robotics Hackathon at GraVITas ’25. Teams of two will compete in AI, robotics, and software development, solving a problem statement revealed at the start.Participation is restricted to 4th year students. Winners will receive cash prizes, goodies, and exclusive 6-month paid internships at Neuralzome.
Event is restricted only for final year B-Tech students
ROBOVITICS.short_description: Neuralzome, in collaboration with RoboVITics, is hosting a 24-hour AI & Robotics Hackathon at GraVITas ’25. Teams of two will compete in AI, robotics, and software development, solving a problem statement revealed at the start.Participation is restricted to 4th year students. Winners will receive cash prizes, goodies, and exclusive 6-month paid internships at Neuralzome. Event is open only for final year B-Tech students

ROBOVITICS.name: Hands on Electronics
ROBOVITICS.description: A workshop on basics of electronics for high school students. The session will contain basic concepts related to electronics, such as, current, voltage, types of circuits, active and passive components etc. We will also showcase some of the projects created by us such as a hand gesture controlled bot, an ultrasonic sensor based radar and some other stuff. We will also demonstrate a circuit using a breadboard to demonstrate the significance and applications of components like resistors, capacitors, LEDs, buttons etc. The session also reinforces electrical safety, systematic troubleshooting, and basic design thinking.
ROBOVITICS.short_description: This workshop teaches high school students the basics of electronics. It covers key concepts like current and voltage, demonstrates projects such as a gesture-controlled bot and an ultrasonic radar, and includes a hands-on breadboard circuit demonstration. The session also emphasizes electrical safety, troubleshooting, and design thinking.
ROBOVITICS.tagline: Unleash your potential and build the future with practical, hands-on electronic projects

ROBOVITICS.name: Machine Design with Fusion 360
ROBOVITICS.description: The Machine Design workshop is a hands-on, 2-day Workshop focused on mastering Autodesk Fusion 360 for designing mechanical components and assemblies. Participants will learn essential skills including sketching techniques, 3D CAD modeling, joints and assembly. The workshop will also cover rendering for realistic visual presentations, real-time simulation using PyBullet for physics-based motion and interaction testing, stress analysis, and animation to demonstrate mechanical movements.
ROBOVITICS.short_description: A 24 hour workshop focused on Teaching Fusion360 and real time simulation.

THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.name: நுட்பம் (Nutpam)
THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.description:
PB–TLA brings a unique Tech Meets Tamil experience event for this Gravitas’25. The event consists of No-code Machine Learning workshop where participants explore how AI understands Tamil. Students will train simple models to recognize Tamil alphabets, analyze texts, and classify cultural images, gaining a fun and practical introduction to Artificial Intelligence. 
 The event also continues with a mini-hackathon that challenges students to design Tamil-inspired tech prototypes. Using coding, no-code platforms, and ML tools, teams will create innovative solutions such as Tamil learning apps, cultural chatbots, AI dictionaries, or digital accessibility tools.
THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.short_description:
PB–TLA brings a unique Tech Meets Tamil experience at Gravitas’25.
 The event starts with a No-code ML workshop exploring how AI understands Tamil.
 Students will train models to recognize alphabets, analyze texts, and classify images.
 A mini-hackathon then challenges teams to design Tamil-inspired tech prototypes.
 From learning apps to chatbots and AI tools, innovation meets culture in this event.

THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.name: Code Cortex 2.0
THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.description: An electrifying hackathon where innovation meets adrenaline! This high-energy event unites brilliant minds to tackle real-world challenges, unleash cutting-edge code, and build game-changing solutions.
THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.short_description: The ultimate innovation race: Code, create, and conquer.

THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.name: Data Alchemy 3.0
THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.description: A dynamic workshop where brilliant minds dive into data analysis and visualization, turning raw info into powerful insights. It’s a magnet for top talent ready to transform numbers into magic! From foundational concepts to advanced techniques, we’ll cover it all—hands-on, practical, and designed to take you from beginner to master.
THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.short_description: A dynamic workshop where brilliant minds dive into data analysis and visualization, turning raw info into powerful insights. It’s a magnet for top talent ready to transform numbers into magic!

THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.name: SURVIVAL SHOWDOWN - The Stranger Things version
THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.description: The Competitive Escape Room – a pulse-pounding event packed with mind-bending puzzles and challenges that push your problem-solving and teamwork skills to the limit. It’s an immersive, high-stakes experience where logic meets adrenaline!
THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.short_description: A themed Competitive Escape Room – with brain-teasing puzzles and teamwork. Get ready for an adrenaline fueled event!
THE AI & ML CLUB - TAM.tagline: Escape the upside down before it escapes you

JUVENILE CARE.name: Juvenile Care Premier League (Internal)
JUVENILE CARE.description: The Juvenile Care Premier League (JCPL) is a fun-filled sports initiative by Juvenile Care that brings joy, teamwork, and inclusivity to orphanage children. Through engaging outdoor games, it offers them a platform to play, learn, build confidence, and create lasting memories. JCPL is not just a sports event—it’s a celebration of childhood, care, and community.
JUVENILE CARE.short_description: JCPL is a fun outdoor sports event for orphanage children, fostering smiles, teamwork, confidence, and cherished memories.
JUVENILE CARE.tagline: Every Child, A Champion — building confidence, teamwork, and memories beyond the game

JUVENILE CARE.name: Juvenile Care Premier League (External)
JUVENILE CARE.description: The Juvenile Care Premier League (JCPL) is a fun-filled sports initiative by Juvenile Care that brings joy, teamwork, and inclusivity to orphanage children. Through engaging outdoor games, it offers them a platform to play, learn, build confidence, and create lasting memories. JCPL is not just a sports event—it’s a celebration of childhood, care, and community.
JUVENILE CARE.short_description: JCPL is a fun outdoor sports event for orphanage children, fostering smiles, teamwork, confidence, and cherished memories.
JUVENILE CARE.tagline: Every Child, A Champion — building confidence, teamwork, and memories beyond the game

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: The Great Build-Off: A Race Against the Quake
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: Engineering is more than calculations—it’s about turning ideas into reality! In this event, participants must design and build a structure with limited resources, balancing strength, stability, and creativity. With twists, challenges, and teamwork at its core, every creation will be tested for durability and ingenuity. Only the smartest, strongest, and most innovative design will stand tall!
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: A thrilling fusion of quiz and adventure! Solve mind - bending questions, crack hidden clues, and race from one secret location to the next. Only the sharpest minds and fastest feet will uncover the final treasure!
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.tagline: “Brains on Fire, Feet on the Run!”

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: Techno Arena
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: Techno Arena — the ultimate fusion of brainpower, teamwork, and fun! This dynamic event zone brings together a series of engaging technical challenges and high-energy non-technical games, offering something for everyone to enjoy and excel at. Whether you’re solving clever puzzles, racing against the clock in logic-based challenges, or diving into entertaining team games that test coordination and creativity.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: Techno Arena blends technical challenges and fun games, fostering creativity, teamwork, learning, and excitement in an engaging, unforgettable arena experience.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.tagline: One Arena. One Code. Infinite Loops. Endless Logic, Boundless Minds.

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: PyQuest
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: Forget boring theory - this is Python in action! In this hands-on workshop, you’ll build a useful project. Guided step-by-step by speaker, you’ll code, experiment and customize your own creation. Walk away with both a working build and the confidence to take Python beyond the classroom. Ready to turn ideas into reality? Get ready to code your way to something amazing!
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.club: The Institution of Engineering and Technology (IET)
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: A hands-on Python workshop where you build, customize and work on a project - guided step-by-step to boost skills and confidence

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: SENSORA
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: SENSORA 2025, the flagship international techno-management event of ISOI–VIT, will be held on 26–27 September at VIT Vellore during Gravitas. Featuring expert workshops, industry talks, and a 36-hour hackathon, it brings together students, innovators, and leaders from companies like Siemens, SAGE and Shark Tank-funded startups, focusing on AI, IoT, healthcare, and wireless systems to drive impactful innovation.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: SENSORA 2025, ISOI–VIT’s flagship international techno-management event, brings together innovators, developers, and leaders for workshops, talks, and a 36-hour hackathon—where creativity, collaboration, and technology drive groundbreaking innovations.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.tagline: Hack hard, play harder — because the future belongs to those who never stop.

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: Grid Grab
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: Grid Grab is a fast-paced, Monopoly-inspired team challenge where 3–5 players per team join forces to test their knowledge, strategy, and innovation. Teams compete in quiz rounds, earn resources, and trade or outsmart rivals to seize control of the grid. The event runs in two slots—morning and evening—with different teams battling it out. Every move comes with hidden twists, so think fast, play smart, and roll your way to victory!
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.club: Solar energy society of India X Student's association of Bio-engineering science and technology
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: Grid Grab is a fast-paced team challenge where knowledge and strategy help you earn resources, outsmart rival teams, and control the grid.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.tagline: Compete with knowledge, trade resources, and use strategy to master the grid for victory.

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: Antidote Hunt
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: In a quaint little town nestled into the landscape, it is rumored to be the home of a mad scientist with ideas so radical, his experiments have been classified as crimes against humanity. Sources suggest that his most recent project is some kind of pathogen so dangerous that, if released would cause a mass extinction event. Through an underground network, a pathogen sample from one of his tests has been obtained. The secret service has decided to hire some of the world's best scientists to find a cure for the pathogen before it breaks out. The participants will assume the role of the scientists, working in teams to uncover the contents of the sample. The teams will be tested at each turn, having to run chromatographs, read data, and find staining patterns to accurately identify the mystery pathogen. The final goal is to find the antidote for the disease. The team to accurately find the cure the fastest will be lauded as heroes among their peers and will be rewarded by the Secret Service for their courage in the face of doom.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: Elite biotech operatives take on a mission-style challenge. Decode antidotes, analyze samples, and race to trace the pathogen through chromatography, staining, and more, all in a high-stakes, lab-driven battle for survival.

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: Potternova
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: Potternova is a Harry Potter–themed tech event where magic blends with technology. Across two days, participants tackle coding, debugging, and problem-solving challenges with a magical twist. Creativity, logic, and teamwork are key as teams navigate unique tasks inspired by the wizarding world, making this an unforgettable journey into tech wizardry.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: Potternova is a Harry Potter–themed tech event blending coding, logic, and creativity with magical twists and challenges.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.tagline: Where magic meets logic, unleash your wizardry through spells of code and tech challenges.

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: Capture The Flag 3.0
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: Capture The Flag 3.0 (CTF 3.0) is the third edition of IEEE ComSoc VIT's flagship team- based tech hunt that blends logical reasoning, real-time problem-solving, and campus-wide strategy.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.tagline: Roam and Zone, Flags of Your Own?????

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: EnerVision
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: Ready to engineer the future of energy? In this overnight hackathon, innovators shall join forces to push loT technology to its limits. Build smart sensor-powered solutions, craft intelligent algorithms, and solve urgent energy challenges head-on. With expert reviews shaping every stage, your idea could emerge as the blueprint for how the world powers tomorrow.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: An overnight hackathon where innovators harness IoT, smart sensors, and intelligent algorithms to create cutting-edge solutions for urgent energy challenges.

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: Echoes of the extinct
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: Form a team of 3–5 and battle through an arcade of Jurassic challenges—from mind-bending puzzles to adrenaline-packed mini-games, with surprise auctions that flip the game on its head.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description:
A dinosaur has escaped !!
 Teams must investigate evidence, identify which dinosaur has escaped,and strategize how to capture it.

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: ELECTRA
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: IEEE-EDS Electra Mini Colloquium provides a unique opportunity to explore breakthroughs in electron devices. With distinguished speakers, technical insights, and interactive sessions, the event connects students, researchers, and industry professionals, creating a vibrant space for learning, networking, and advancing knowledge in semiconductor and electronic device technologies.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: A premier IEEE-EDS event fostering knowledge exchange, collaboration, and insights into emerging trends and technologies in electron devices.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.tagline: Connecting minds and shaping the future of electronics through research and innovation.

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: CodeRush 3.0
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: CodeRush 3.0 is the flagship competitive coding event of IEEE TEMS at graVITas’25, featuring a unique relay-race style coding challenge. Teams of three participants will take turns coding, with each member continuing from where the previous teammate left off. The event is conducted under a strict time limit, testing participants’ coding skills, problem-solving ability, and teamwork under pressure.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.club: IEEE Technology and Engineering Management Society (IEEE-TEMS)
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: CodeRush 3.0 challenges teams of three in a thrilling relay-style coding race, testing logic, speed, strategy, and teamwork under pressure.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.tagline: Relay your logic, race the clock, and rise as coding champions

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: 404 Fun Found
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: Forget typical hackathons - this is a high-energy, multi-round showdown where coding is only part of the game. Expect puzzles, trivia, logic challenges and quirky twists that test speed, creativity, strategy and teamwork. Each round pushes you beyond limits with surprises that keep you guessing. Gather your team and dive into the ultimate blend of skill, wit and fun!
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.club: The Institution of Engineering and Technology (IET)
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: A fast-paced multi-round challenge mixing puzzles, trivia, coding and teamwork - race against time, think creatively and outsmart surprises
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.tagline: Crack the Clues, Catch the Fun

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: Hackovation 2.0
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: Hackovation 2.0 is a dynamic 36-hour hackathon crafted to inspire participants to design impactful solutions addressing real-world challenges. Teams will collaborate intensively across diverse domains such as Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Internet of Things, Sustainability, Automation, Fintech, Healthcare, Cybersecurity, and beyond. The event strives to cultivate innovation, technical mastery, and collective problem-solving.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: Hackovation 2.0 is a 36-hour hackathon bringing together creative minds to innovate, collaborate, and build impactful solutions for real-world challenges.

THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.name: CivilHunt 2.0
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.description: CivilHunt 2.0 is a team event where students solve campus-based riddles, puzzles, and challenges that represent steps in building a virtual dam. After each task, teams spin a digital Dam Wheel for surprises—either boosts or setbacks. With coordinators tracking progress, the team earning the most dam progress after all tasks wins. Teamwork, strategy, and campus spirit unite.
THE INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERING AND TECHN.short_description: CivilHunt2.0 is about solving series of tasks, building a metaphorical dam experiencing ups&downs simulating a construction project.

STUDENTS FOR THE EXPLORATION AND DEVELOP.name: Star Party
STUDENTS FOR THE EXPLORATION AND DEVELOP.description:
StarParty is SEDS-VIT’s flagship overnight stargazing event, offering a breathtaking view of the cosmos from the iconic Technology Tower rooftop. Discover planets, constellations, and deep-sky objects through immersive, hands-on sessions led by passionate students. From telescope tutorials to guided sky tours, StarParty brings the universe closer than ever before.
Join us for this annual celestial celebration, a night of wonder, learning, and unforgettable memories under the stars
STUDENTS FOR THE EXPLORATION AND DEVELOP.club: STUDENTS FOR THE EXPLORATION AND DEVELOPMENT OF SPACE (SEDS)
STUDENTS FOR THE EXPLORATION AND DEVELOP.short_description:
Get ready to witness the universe like never before! 
Join SEDS-VIT’s StarParty for a magical night of stargazing on the Technology Tower rooftop. Explore planets, constellations, cosmic wonders and powerful telescopes. Don’t miss this unforgettable experience!
STUDENTS FOR THE EXPLORATION AND DEVELOP.tagline: Join SEDS-VIT’s StarParty for stargazing sessions atop Technology Tower.

SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).name: Bloodlines 2.0
SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).description: Bloodlines 2.0 is SBE-VIT’s thrilling forensic science competition where teams dive into real-world inspired cases. Using DNA analysis, blood typing, and genetic markers, participants race against time to solve puzzles of paternity and ancestry. Combining accuracy, speed, and teamwork, the event challenges competitors to apply scientific methods and uncover the truth.
SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).short_description: Race against time in Bloodlines 2.0: solve ancestry and paternity tests using DNA, blood analysis, and forensic science.

SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).name: Build-A-Terr 2.0
SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).description: Discover your creativity at Build-A-Terr 2.0, a hands-on workshop where you craft your own unique terrarium in a jar. Design, build, and personalize your miniature green world and then take it home as a living keepsake!
SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).short_description: Discover your creativity at Build-A-Terr 2.0- where you craft, build and personalize your own terrarium in a jar!

SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).name: Synaptic Sprint
SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).description: This is a high energy, relay style event where teams act as neurons racing through brain loves. Participants solve biology based cognitive challenges to restore a failing cortex, combining neuroscience, teamwork, and strategy in a fast-paced format.
SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).short_description: Brain Simulation game where each of the rounds are based on the four lobes of the brain

SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).name: Yellow Tape 4.0
SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).description: Step into the role of a detective in Yelllow Tape, a thrilling crime solving challenge. Examine clues, interrogate witnesses and unravel deception with your team to crack the case before time runs out!
SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).short_description: Murder mystery based event where participants solve crimes by solving clues and interrogating suspects in a given time limit.
SOCIETY FOR BIOLOGICAL ENGINEERING (SBE).tagline: Everyone's a suspect. No one's safe

STANDARDS CLUB.name: Standards CAM-HACK 2.0
STANDARDS CLUB.description: A 2-day Fusion 360 Hackathon where participants design, model, and prototype real-world solutions using CAD, CAM, simulation, and industry standards. Over 34 hours, teams will collaborate, innovate, and present their creations to judges, blending creativity, engineering, and problem-solving in an exciting design sprint.
STANDARDS CLUB.short_description: A 2-day Fusion 360 Hackathon where teams design, prototype, and pitch innovative solutions using CAD, CAM, and creativity.
STANDARDS CLUB.tagline: Design. Simulate. Innovate. Unlock Your Creativity with Hands-On Fusion 360 Mastery!

STANDARDS CLUB.name: Fusion of CAM and Standards
STANDARDS CLUB.description: Join us for a hands-on workshop diving into the world of Fusion 360, where design meets manufacturing. Learn how to create precise models, generate toolpaths, and understand key CAM (Computer-Aided Manufacturing) workflows — all while following industry standards to ensure accuracy, safety, and efficiency. Guided by an experienced instructor, you'll get practical insights and tips to take your CAD/CAM skills to the next level. Whether you're a beginner or looking to sharpen your expertise, this session will help you bridge the gap between design creativity and manufacturing precision.
STANDARDS CLUB.short_description: This workshop offers a practical introduction to Fusion 360, focusing on the CAD (Computer-Aided Design) and CAM (Computer-Aided Manufacturing) processes. Participants will learn to create accurate 3D models and generate toolpaths for manufacturing, ensuring designs meet industry standards for safety, accuracy, and efficiency. This hands-on session is ideal for anyone wanting to improve their design and manufacturing skills, guided by an expert instructor.
STANDARDS CLUB.tagline: Design. Simulate. Innovate. Unlock Your Creativity with Hands-On Fusion 360 Mastery!

SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).name: Formula-Aero: Design-a-thon
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).description: Welcome to Formula-Aero, a high-octane design challenge where innovation meets engineering. This competition challenges participants to concentrate and design the aerodynamics of a Formula style race car. Participants will gain valuable skills in motorsport and mechanical design. A Rs.15,000 prize pool is awarded for the most innovative and effective aerodynamic designs.
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).short_description: A high-octane design challenge where innovation meets engineering, with a Rs.15,000 prize pool for the best aerodynamic designs.

SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).name: SoapBox Racing
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).description: Soap Box is your chance to design, build, and race your very own car! Put your technical and mechanical skills into action as you work hands-on with the complete kit we provide. From assembling the chassis to fine-tuning for performance, every step is yours to create. And the best part? You get to take your creation to the track and race it! Whether you’ve dreamed of being a mechanic, an engineer, or a racer, this event gives you the perfect platform to learn, build, and experience the thrill of driving something you made yourself. This will be a 3-day event.
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).short_description: Soap Box is your chance to design, build, and race your own car! With a complete kit provided, you’ll assemble the chassis, fine-tune for performance, and take your creation to the track. It’s the perfect blend of engineering, mechanics, and racing excitement—all in one hands-on experience. This will be a 3-day event.

SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).name: Quadcopter
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).description: Join Quadcopter, an exciting 3-day hands-on workshop where you’ll build, fly, and keep your own drone! From unboxing the kit to final flight, our experts guide every step. Explore drone technology, experience the thrill of flight, and watch your creation soar. Perfect for enthusiasts and beginners alike—build it, fly it, own it. Your drone journey starts here!
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).club: Society of Automotive Engineers ( SAE - VIT )
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).short_description: Build, fly, and own your drone in this 3-day hands-on workshop—experience drone technology, flight thrills, and innovation.
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).tagline: From assembly to flight, create and own your personal drone adventure today.

SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).name: SAE AirShow
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).description: Team Vimaanas & Rotor FPV from SAE-VIT presents AirShow! Witness thrilling aerial stunts and engineering mastery in a two-part spectacle: Team Vimaanas takes to the skies with high-speed model aircraft in the first half, followed by Rotor FPV's heart-pumping drone show in the second half!
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).short_description: Team Vimaanas & Rotor FPV from SAE-VIT presents AirShow: Planes & drones unite for a thrilling aerial spectacle of speed & skill!
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).tagline: Experience the thrill of flight with stunning aerial stunts and engineering brilliance.

SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).name: Aerodominator 11.0
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).description: Part of Gravitas 2025, Aerodominator brings top teams from across India (and beyond) to design, build & fly radio-controlled aircraft under real-world constraints. Aerodominator offers a platform to learn, interact and test your Aircraft Engineering Skills. The mission statement is to deploy an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) that will be launched from a designated takeoff zone and accurately drop payload (water) mid-air into a targeted payload drop zone of dimension 10m x 10m in minimum time without major damages to the airframe, serving as a rapid-response aid in fire-affected areas to support firefighting and disaster relief efforts
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).short_description: Aerodominator challenges top teams from across India and beyond to design, build, and fly radio-controlled aircraft under real-world constraints.

SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).name: SAE Drone Racing League
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).description: The Drone Racing League (DRL) event at our college technical fest is designed to deliver a thrilling combination of speed, precision, and innovation, conducted strictly under the MultiGP international standards and rules. The races will take place on standardized MultiGP tracks, specially designed with gates, flags, and technical obstacles to replicate real-world competitive drone racing conditions. These tracks feature a mix of sharp turns, slalom paths, vertical elements, and high-speed straights, challenging pilots to demonstrate mastery over agility, control, and split-second decision-making. All participating drones will be required to comply with MultiGP class specifications regarding size, weight, batteries, and video transmission systems, ensuring a fair and uniform platform for all competitors. To maintain safety and professionalism, the event will include strict pre-race inspections, pilot briefings, and real-time monitoring by referees and race marshals. The competition format will progress from multiple timed heats to semifinals and a grand finale, with automated lap timing systems ensuring precise and transparent results. Separate categories may also be introduced for novice and advanced pilots, allowing enthusiasts of all experience levels to participate and learn within a structured environment.
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).short_description: A Racing Competition for FPV Drone pilots at the professional as well as amateur (college teams) level. The Pilots will have to fly their drones across the designated track, which will be built at the event venue.

SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).name: PCBify
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).description:
Are you curious about how electronic devices are built, or how complex circuits come to life on compact green boards? 
Here’s your chance to explore the fascinating world of Printed Circuit Boards (PCBs) through an immersive, beginner-friendly workshop.

Over the span of two days, participants will gain both theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience in PCB design. 
Starting from the fundamentals of electronic circuits and schematic design, the workshop will guide students through design software tools, component placement, routing techniques, and industry standards. By the end of the workshop, attendees will have designed their very own PCB, bridging the gap between conceptual circuits and real-world applications.
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).short_description:
A two-day beginner-friendly workshop introducing the world of Printed Circuit Boards (PCBs). 
Participants will learn the basics of electronic circuits, 
schematic design, component placement, and routing using design software. By the end, they will create their own PCB, gaining both theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience.
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).tagline: Beginner-friendly workshop to learn PCB design basics and create your own circuit board in two days.

SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).name: SAE Go Karting
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).description: Go Karting brings high-speed excitement to campus, giving you the chance to test your driving skills or pick them up on the go! Our specially designed race track will challenge your reflexes, control, and speed as you take on sharp turns and straight-line sprints. Race head-to-head with friends, feel the adrenaline build with every lap, and push your limits to see who claims victory. Whether you’re chasing the thrill of competition or simply want to experience racing for the first time, this is your moment to throttle up and own the track!
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).short_description: Feel the rush of Go Karting on campus—sharp turns, fast sprints, pure adrenaline! Race your friends and own the track.
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).tagline: Floor the pedal and drive your heart out in an adrenaline-filled GoKarting experience.

SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).name: Aero-Crafters
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).description: AeroCrafters is an engaging workshop where you’ll explore the fundamentals of airplanes and flight dynamics before building your own model plane with guidance from the skilled Asailing Falcons team. Gain valuable hands-on experience, deepen your understanding of aeronautics, and develop essential teamwork skills along the way. This is the perfect opportunity to combine learning with fun, as you work alongside passionate mentors and fellow enthusiasts. From understanding how planes take flight to watching your own creation soar. This workshop offers both knowledge and unforgettable memories in one exciting package!
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).short_description: Aero-Crafters is a 3-day workshop at graVITas where VIT students design, build, and fly model aircraft in teams, guided by SAE-VIT and Assailing Falcons
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).tagline: Take off into aeromodelling — a hands-on journey with SAE-VIT & Assailing Falcons.

SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).name: SAE Grand Prix
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).description: SAE Grand Prix is an electrifying overnight event where you step in as the team principal of your own racing crew. From strategy to quick decision-making under pressure, every choice matters. Experience the thrill of a night race, build teamwork, and live the motorsport dream. Gather your crew, light up the track, and race into the night!
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).short_description: SAE Grand Prix is the event where you step in as the team principal of your own racing crew. From strategy to quick decision-making under pressure. Experience the thrill of a night race, build teamwork, and live the motorsport dream.
SOCIETY OF AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERS (SAE).tagline: Light up the track, and race into the night!

SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).name: Programming the Future: Experiential Learning in Industrial Robotics for Industry 4.0
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).description: Discover "Programming the Future: Experiential Learning in Industrial Robotics for Industry 4.0"—a dynamic, hands-on training experience that connects theory to real-world skills in smart manufacturing. Engage directly with FANUC LR Mate and Universal Robots Cobot, mastering intuitive programming, simulation, and modern automation technologies. Explore integration with sensors, vision systems, and automation cells. The course immerses you in Industry 4.0 essentials: IoT connectivity, interoperability, and data-driven innovation. Learn how robotics transforms production while prioritizing safety and collaboration. Perfect for students, engineers, and professionals, this program unlocks the expertise needed to excel in tomorrow’s advanced manufacturing landscape.
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).tagline: Programming the Future: Experiential Learning in Industrial Robotics for Industry 4.0

SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).name: Fuel Of Shadows
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).description: Fuel of Shadows is a multi-stage escape room that challenges participants to restore power in a simulated blackout scenario. Through timed puzzles rooted in logic, circuitry, and mechanical design, teams must collaborate, think critically, and race against the clock to escape the shadows. Designed for thrill-seekers and problem-solvers, this event blends immersive storytelling with real-world engineering challenges.
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).short_description: Fuel of shadows is an escape room type game based on automobiles.
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).tagline: Unleash the secret. Race the shadows. Claim the truth.

SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).name: Manufacture Your Dream: RC Cars Building and Racing
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).description: Join us for "Manufacture Your Dream: RC Car Building and Racing," where you'll build and race your own RC car. With tools, materials, and guidance provided, compete on a custom track for the fastest car award. Experience creativity, competition, and fun as you bring your ideas to life!
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).short_description: Unleash creativity—build, compete, and race your dream RC car. Conquer the track, win prizes, and fuel your passion
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).tagline: Build, race, and innovate—experience the thrill of manufacturing your dream RC car.

SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).name: Aero-Vision
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).description: Join us for a one-day intensive workshop on aero-modelling software, where you'll learn to design, analyze, and simulate using tools like XFLR8 and Fusion 360. Gain hands-on experience in creating CAD models, running aerodynamic simulationS and understanding design principles. Perfect for beginners and enthusiasts, this event equips you with practical skills to bring your aero-modelling ideas to life.
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).short_description: A one-day workshop on XFLR8 and Fusion 360--learn CAD modeling,aerodynamic simulations, and aero-modelling basics through hands-on training.

SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).name: The Cube-Sat Workshop
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).description: Come to our two-day CubeSat workshop! You will use CAD to design a CubeSat in this workshop, then put the simplified functional satellite together and test it. Learn electronics, data analysis, and microcontroller programming. The best part is that you will bring home your CubeSat model, which combines space engineering, practical construction, and creativity to record actual data.
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).short_description: Build your own satellite! Design, program, and construct a working model during our two-day workshop. You'll even bring it home to gather real data.
SOCIETY OF MANUFACTURING ENGINEERS (SME).tagline: Discovering Space, One Cube at a Time

TREKKING CLUB.name: Detective Dilemma
TREKKING CLUB.description: The Detective Dilemma event at VIT Vellore is an immersive, 30-minute crime simulation where teams analyze a realistic crime scene, gather physical and verbal clues, interrogate witnesses, and synthesize evidence to identify the culprit, motive, and method, fostering critical thinking, teamwork, and deduction skills in a thrilling, competitive environment.
TREKKING CLUB.short_description: A 30-minute crime-solving event at VIT, requiring teams to collect evidence and identify the culprit through teamwork and logic

TREKKING CLUB.name: Nerf Wars
TREKKING CLUB.description: Nerf Wars is an exciting team-based activity where players use Nerf blasters and foam darts in a safe environment. Game modes like Capture the Flag, Team Elimination, and Base Defense test strategy, teamwork, and reflexes. The event promotes coordination, leadership, and problem-solving while delivering fun, energy, and friendly competition, ensuring a thrilling experience for all.
TREKKING CLUB.short_description: Nerf Wars uses Nerf guns and foam darts in thrilling battles, combining strategy, teamwork, and nonstop fun for participants.
TREKKING CLUB.tagline: Experience the thrill of Nerf battles where teamwork, strategy, and fun collide.

TREKKING CLUB.name: Laser Room
TREKKING CLUB.description: Cross the Laser Room by dodging glowing beams and racing against time! Each participant must make it from one side to the other with a maximum of 3 laser touches allowed. Precision, agility, and speed decide your success—can you escape without getting caught?
TREKKING CLUB.short_description: “Cross the laser-filled room, dodge beams, and reach the other side without exceeding three touches.”
TREKKING CLUB.tagline: “Dodge the beams, race the clock, and escape the Laser Room Challenge!”

TREKKING CLUB.name: Escape Room
TREKKING CLUB.description: Trapped in a locked room with only your wits and teammates to rely on, participants must solve a series of mind-bending riddles, uncover hidden clues, and crack clever puzzles — all within a limited time. This thrilling escape room challenge tests your logic, teamwork, and presence of mind. Will you escape in time?
TREKKING CLUB.short_description: Race against time in an exciting escape room, solving riddles and puzzles with teamwork, logic, and sharp thinking to escape.
TREKKING CLUB.tagline: Every corner hides a clue, every riddle holds a secret, and every second slips away.

AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.name: Operation Antidote: The Final Formula
AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.description: SMV is under siege by a mysterious virus—experience a zombie apocalypse simulation where survivors, engineers, medics, scientists, tacticians, and zombies collaborate or compete through 4 problem-solving rounds. Tackle resource shortage, barricades, plot twists, and emergencies for bonus points. Shape your fate: will teamwork and strategy lead you to the cure or will betrayal turn the tide for the undead?
AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.short_description: The ultimate campus apocalypse simulation combines physical engineering challenges and dramatic role-playing for a tech fest experience unlike any other.
AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.tagline: Race against time to decode chaos and forge the cure before it’s too late.

AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.name: Smooth Operator
AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.description: Smooth Operator is a Formula 1- themed K-12 workshop where 8-10 member pit crews tackle challenges at high-speed pit stops. From unstable fuels to overheating coolant and tyre grip loss, teams do hands-on experiments during the Grand Prix . Time constraints adds excitement, blending engineering skill with the adrenaline of racing.
AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.short_description: Smooth Operator is Formula 1- themed workshop where pit crews tackle challenges and solve problem faced by their favourite racer in the Grand Prix!
AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.tagline: Finishing fast is not always bad.

AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.name: Trust issues
AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.description: Trust Issues is a survival-style quiz-meets-engineering challenge where knowledge, speed, and betrayal collide. Round one features a rapid-fire buzzer quiz on common knowledge and basic engineering. Eliminated players regroup as rivals in round two—hands-on, time-bound chemical experiments testing precision and problem-solving. Retained teammates boost scoring chances, making adaptability the ultimate key to victory.
AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.short_description: Trust Issues blends quizzes, betrayal, and chemical experiments—testing knowledge, adaptability, and teamwork under pressure for ultimate survival.
AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CHEMICAL ENGINEERS.tagline: “Do you trust your friends … enough to survive Trust Issues?”

CUBING CLUB.name: SmowXpress
CUBING CLUB.description: SmowXpress is a fast-paced, hands-on IoT workshop where you build smarter, faster. Using Smowcode, a visual coding language that’s 10x quicker than traditional coding, you’ll prototype real industrial IoT solutions on the ESP32 in just hours. Learn, create, and demo your projects live—whether you’re a beginner or enthusiast, experience the thrill of innovation in one power-packed session.
CUBING CLUB.short_description: SmowXpress: A fast-paced workshop using Smowcode—10x faster coding on ESP32. Build industrial IoT prototypes in hours and demo live.

CUBING CLUB.name: Just LEGO It
CUBING CLUB.description: "Just LEGO it!" is a creativity-packed event where participants form teams and bring their imaginations to life using LEGO bricks. Across three exciting rounds, they’ll build, adapt, and innovate under fun challenges. From crafting buildings to transforming them with unique themes and finally tackling a surprise twist, this event tests creativity, problem-solving, and teamwork.
CUBING CLUB.short_description: Participants will receive LEGO pieces and a theme, and they must build something creative that aligns with the given theme.

CUBING CLUB.name: Echos in Order
CUBING CLUB.description: Echos in Order is a clue-hunt where every audio and video clip hides patterns, anomalies, and secret hints. Players must decode rhythms, spot visual cues, and connect scattered fragments to unlock the next stage. Only those who can truly "hear" and "see" beyond the obvious will reach the final revelation.Echos in Order is a multi-sensory clue-hunt using audio-visual puzzles, testing analytical, perceptual, and collaborative problem-solving skills.
CUBING CLUB.short_description: Echos in Order is a multi-sensory clue hunt using audio and visual puzzles, testing analytical, perceptual, and collaborative problem solving skills.
CUBING CLUB.tagline: Hear the unseen, see the unheard.

CUBING CLUB.name: SOLVE YOUR BRAIN
CUBING CLUB.description: In this interactive EEG demonstration, participants wear EEG bands that project their brainwaves live while solving puzzles like the Rubik’s Cube. The audience experiences both the challenge and the fascinating brain activity behind it, blending science with excitement. At the end, each participant receives a personalized brainwave report, making the event insightful, engaging, and unforgettable.
CUBING CLUB.short_description: Participants wear EEG bands, solve puzzles, display brainwaves live, engage audience, and receive personalized brainwave activity reports after challenges

DREAM MERCHANTS.name: Dream Team 7.0
DREAM MERCHANTS.description: Dream Team 7.0 is an immersive IPL auction simulation that puts participants in the role of franchise owners. Teams of friends strategize together to build competitive squads through budgeted bidding, combining the thrill of player auctions with real-world skills such as strategic planning, financial management, and teamwork. Participants must carefully analyze player values, balance team composition, and make tactical decisions to maximize points and performance. The event offers a realistic and engaging environment where cricket knowledge meets business strategy, rewarding both competitive spirit and collaborative thinking. Dream Team 7.0 is not just a game—it’s a test of strategy, leadership, and smart decision-making in the world of cricket management.
DREAM MERCHANTS.short_description: Dream Team 7.0 is a strategic IPL auction simulation where participants collaborate by forming teams with friends to act as franchise owners, building competitive squads through budgeted bidding. This event promotes strategic planning , financial management , and teamwork skills in a realistic and engaging environment.
DREAM MERCHANTS.tagline: Where Champions Are Bought, Not Born!

DREAM MERCHANTS.name: Bricks By Bid
DREAM MERCHANTS.description: Bricks by Bid is a strategic simulation where participants form teams with friends to collaboratively build and expand their infrastructure. The event features bidding-based auctions for raw materials and city assets, alongside resource trading and infrastructure development. It promotes teamwork, negotiation, and resource management skills in an engaging and competitive environment.
DREAM MERCHANTS.short_description: Bricks by Bid is a team-based simulation of bidding, trading, and building infrastructure, fostering strategy, negotiation, and resource management.
DREAM MERCHANTS.tagline: Trade Smart, Bid Bold, Build Big, Transform Ideas into Bricks.

AMERICAN SOCIETY OF CIVIL ENGINEERS (ASC.name: Bridge It
AMERICAN SOCIETY OF CIVIL ENGINEERS (ASC.description: Bridge It is a flagship two-day workshop and competition that blends theory with hands-on creativity. Participants learn bridge design basics, then apply them through model-making and load testing. Evaluated on strength, efficiency, and innovation, the event fosters teamwork, problem-solving, and design thinking—offering a unique platform to showcase creativity and build beyond boundaries.
AMERICAN SOCIETY OF CIVIL ENGINEERS (ASC.short_description: Bridge It Eklavya is a two-day event where participants explore the fundamentals of bridge design and construction through interactive sessions, practical model-building, and testing challenges that encourage innovation and teamwork.

AMERICAN SOCIETY OF CIVIL ENGINEERS (ASC.name: DESIGNFORGE 2.0
AMERICAN SOCIETY OF CIVIL ENGINEERS (ASC.description:
DESIGNFORGE 2.0 is a premier structural engineering program designed for civil and structural engineering enthusiasts. It unfolds in two phases:

Phase 1 – Workshop: Participants undergo intensive hands-on training in Autodesk Revit, learning interface navigation, advanced modeling, detailing, and project documentation through a guided mini-project.

Phase 2 – Design Challenge + Fun Twists: Teams work on a real-world structural design problem using Revit. Alongside technical modeling, they will face surprise “fun challenges” such as sudden design modifications, sabotage elements, and simulated crisis alerts (e.g., flood conditions). These dynamic tasks test participants’ adaptability, problem-solving, and teamwork under pressure.


This unique blend of structured learning, technical application, and creative unpredictability fosters innovation, professional growth, and collaboration, bridging academic knowledge with real-world industry practices.
AMERICAN SOCIETY OF CIVIL ENGINEERS (ASC.short_description: DESIGNFORGE 2.0 is a two-phase event where participants first gain hands-on training in Autodesk Revit and then compete in a design challenge. Phase 2 adds excitement with surprise tasks such as sudden design changes, sabotage twists, and crisis simulations, pushing teams to showcase adaptability, creativity, and teamwork under pressure.

CENTRE FOR SOCIAL ENTREPRENEURSHIP DEVEL.name: Startup Street X
CENTRE FOR SOCIAL ENTREPRENEURSHIP DEVEL.description: Startup Street X marks the 10th edition of our flagship entrepreneurial marathon, a 24-hour overnight challenge immersing participants in the complete startup journey. Visionary thinkers and innovators brainstorm, validate, strategize, and refine ideas with mentor guidance, culminating in a Shark Tank style pitching round judged on innovation and impact. Networking opportunities and exposure to real-world entrepreneurial challenges make this event a launchpad for future changemakers, offering mentorship, insights, and collaboration potential for all involved .
CENTRE FOR SOCIAL ENTREPRENEURSHIP DEVEL.short_description: A high energy 24 hour overnight ideathon where dynamic teams collaborate to brainstorm, develop, and refine groundbreaking startup ideas. Throughout the challenge, participants receive expert mentorship and work towards pitching their business models to industry leaders, aiming for funding, prizes, and transformative mentorship opportunities that propel innovation and entrepreneurship

INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.name: Spectra
INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.description: Build your own AI-powered smartwatch from scratch in this two-day hands-on workshop! Your wearable will feature an OLED display showing date, time, health stats, environmental readings, and team branding. Track heart rate, blood oxygen, step count, sense temperature and pressure, and interact with your watch via AI chatbot. Upon completion, you’ll take home a fully functional smartwatch you built yourself.
INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.short_description: Create your own AI-powered smartwatch with an OLED display, health tracking, environmental sensing, step count, and AI chatbot interaction.
INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.tagline: Track fitness, manage health, and stay connected - all from your wrist.

INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.name: Helix
INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.description: Step into the world of game creation with Helix, a beginner friendly workshop on 3D game development using Unity. Step by step, you will be creating a physics based 3D runner set in a rotating tunnel where gravity flips at your command and obstacles challenge you, while learning Unity, C#, and object oriented programming through hands-on practice.
INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.short_description: Start your game development journey with Helix, a beginner friendly Unity workshop featuring a 3D runner with gravity flipping mechanics.
INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.tagline: Turn the world upside down with creativity, physics, and interactive game challenges.

INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.name: Celestia
INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.description: Celestia is a 24-hour beginner-friendly vibe coding hackathon where AI tools power creativity and innovation. Working in teams, participants will brainstorm, design, and prototype solutions across six tracks—Dev Tools, Open Innovation, SDG, Hardware, EdTech, and Healthcare. The event offers an exciting chance to gain new skills and transform ideas into impactful, real-world solutions.
INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.short_description: Celestia is a 24-hour beginner-friendly vibe coding hackathon spanning six tracks, where participants collaborate, innovate, and pitch impactful ideas.
INDIAN SOCIETY FOR TECHNICAL EDUCATION (.tagline: Shaping a smarter tomorrow through code, collaboration, and innovation at Celestia.

SPIC MACAY.name: Tote-ally Blocked Out 2.0
SPIC MACAY.description:
Tote-ally Blocked Out is back—this time to spark innovation through tradition!
 SPICMACAY brings you the timeless art of Rajasthani block printing. Discover how centuries-old craftsmanship meets modern creativity as you explore block printing with hand-carved wooden blocks, precise alignment, and layered colors to create colourful motifs. Finally, add your personal touch by customizing your tote bag, making it a keepsake that reflects your unique style.
 Walk away with a handcrafted tote that’s not just a keepsake, but a celebration of tradition, technique, and creativity combined.
SPIC MACAY.short_description: Tote-ally Blocked Out is back! With SPICMACAY, discover the elegance of Rajasthani block printing. Explore patterns, play with colours, and craft your own tote bag. Take home a creation that blends tradition, artistry, and your personal touch—a keepsake made by you, for you.
SPIC MACAY.tagline: Your Tote, Your Story, Your Style

SPIC MACAY.name: Nritya Paadhai
SPIC MACAY.description: Get ready to dance, smile, and move with Nritya Paadhai! This exciting Bharatanatyam workshop, led by classically trained members of SPIC MACAY, VIT Vellore, is your ticket to discovering one of India’s most graceful and powerful dance forms. Through fun activities, you'll learn its history, explore basic postures and rhythmic adavus, express yourself through abhinaya and beautiful mudras. By the end, you'll even perform a simple piece together! Perfect for beginners and dance lovers, it's all about having fun while stepping into the world of tradition, rhythm, and storytelling. Come, feel the rhythm, and make every step count!
SPIC MACAY.short_description: Discover the graceful and powerful art of Bharatanatyam! Learn postures, rhythmic adavus, abhinaya, and beautiful mudras through fun, beginner-friendly activities - and perform a simple piece together. Come and join us to feel the rhythm, express yourself, and make every step a story!
SPIC MACAY.tagline: From Traditional Roots to Timeless Expressions

MATRIX- THE MULTIMEDIA CLUB.name: Scratch & Hatch
MATRIX- THE MULTIMEDIA CLUB.description:
Scratch & Hatch is an engaging hands-on workshop designed to introduce students to the exciting world of game development using Scratch, a beginner-friendly visual programming language developed by MIT.
In this workshop, participants will learn the basics of Scratch, explore its drag-and-drop coding blocks, and understand how to bring animations, characters, and interactions to life. Step by step, they will be guided through the process of creating their very own interactive game—from setting up sprites and backgrounds to adding movements, sounds, and scoring systems.
The workshop emphasizes learning by doing. Rather than just theory, participants will actively follow along, experimenting with Scratch as they build a game together with the instructor. By the end of the session, each participant will have not only learned the fundamentals of coding logic but also created a working game they can proudly share and expand upon.
This workshop is perfect for beginners with no prior coding experience. All you need is curiosity and creativity—Scratch will take care of the rest!
MATRIX- THE MULTIMEDIA CLUB.short_description: Scratch & Hatch is a beginner-friendly workshop where you’ll learn to design and code your very own game using Scratch. No prior coding experience needed—just bring your creativity and hatch your first game!
MATRIX- THE MULTIMEDIA CLUB.tagline: Scratch the code, Hatch the future

HEALTH CLUB.name: Fitkit
HEALTH CLUB.description: The Health Club, in collaboration with the Culinary Club and Nutrition Club, presents Fitkit — a mini-hackathon blending technology with healthy living. Teams of 4 will design digital solutions (apps, websites, or tools) that analyze cooking inputs to identify ingredients and provide nutritional breakdowns. Extra credit goes to healthy substitutions, personalized meal suggestions, and smart kitchen integration.
HEALTH CLUB.club: Health club X culinary club X nutrition club
HEALTH CLUB.short_description: Fitkit, a mini-hackathon by Health, Culinary, and Nutrition Clubs, challenges participants to build tech solutions for nutrition analysis and healthier cooking.
HEALTH CLUB.tagline: When coding meets cooking for a healthier tomorrow

HEALTH CLUB.name: Health tech
HEALTH CLUB.description: The Health Tech Ideathon is a one-day innovation challenge where participants create impactful solutions for real-world problems in healthcare, fitness, and wellness. Problem statements will be shared in advance, giving teams time to brainstorm and prepare their ideas. On the event day, the first half will be dedicated to final preparation and refining concepts, while the second half will focus on presentations. Solutions may take the form of mobile apps, wearable devices, AI-based systems, or smart community initiatives. The event aims to inspire creativity, practicality, and social impact. Exciting prizes await the most innovative and meaningful ideas.
HEALTH CLUB.short_description: Participate in the Health Tech Ideathon! Brainstorm innovative ideas in healthcare, fitness, and wellness, present your solutions, and win exciting prizes.
HEALTH CLUB.tagline: Innovating Health, Empowering Lives: Your Ideas for a Better Tomorrow.

HEALTH CLUB.name: Hack the Dash 2.0
HEALTH CLUB.description: Join our Power BI Workshop & Competition! Learn data visualization skills in our workshop and then compete to design interactive dashboards using real datasets. No coding experience needed. Form a team of 3-4 and work together to create innovative dashboards. Top teams win exciting prizes. Explore data analytics in a practical way and have fun. A perfect opportunity to learn and showcase your skills!
HEALTH CLUB.short_description: Join our Power BI Workshop & Competition! Learn data visualization fundamentals and showcase skills for exciting prizes and career growth!
HEALTH CLUB.tagline: Data Meets Creativity:Unlock Insights with Power BI

IEEE CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS (IEEE-CAS).name: Bits and Beats
IEEE CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS (IEEE-CAS).description: Bits and Beats is a hands-on workshop introducing audio signal processing using MATLAB and Simulink. Participants will explore the fundamentals of DSP through a mini-project on creating chorus and flanger effects, gaining practical experience in real-time audio processing—an excellent foundation for careers in audio engineering, DSP, embedded systems, and music production.
IEEE CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS (IEEE-CAS).short_description: Hands-on MATLAB workshop on audio signal processing with mini-projects on chorus and flanger effects using Simulink.

IEEE CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS (IEEE-CAS).name: FPGA Prototyping Summit
IEEE CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS (IEEE-CAS).description: The FPGA Prototyping Summit is a hands-on workshop guiding students through Verilog-based RTL design and FPGA implementation. Covering the full FPGA design flow—from simulation to hardware deployment—it bridges academic theory with industry practices, preparing participants for careers in VLSI, embedded systems, and semiconductors through interactive sessions, demos, and guided coding exercises.
IEEE CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS (IEEE-CAS).short_description: Hands-on workshop on Verilog-based RTL design and FPGA prototyping for careers in VLSI and embedded systems.
IEEE CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS (IEEE-CAS).tagline: Designing the future, one bit at a time.

IEEE CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS (IEEE-CAS).name: Embed Control 6.0
IEEE CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS (IEEE-CAS).description: Embed Control 6.0, the flagship event of IEEE CAS, returns this year with an exciting twist – a hardware hackathon to complement its hands-on workshop. Day one will be an industry expert-guided workshop on the ESP32 development board, and day two is where students will team up and test their knowledge in a hardware hackathon on embedded systems.
IEEE CIRCUITS AND SYSTEMS (IEEE-CAS).short_description: Embed Control 6.0 is an ESP32 workshop and hardware hackathon for students to learn, build, and compete in embedded systems

TOASTMASTERS INTERNATIONAL.name: Crisis Inc. 2.0
TOASTMASTERS INTERNATIONAL.description: Crisis Inc. is an intense corporate crisis simulation where newly promoted department heads race against time to solve evolving company problems. Participants pitch in novel solutions, collaborate for the common cause, and adapt to sudden changes.
