Creativity, strategy, and teamwork are tested in every round, culminating in a high-stakes final crisis where only the sharpest, most cooperative team emerges victorious.
TOASTMASTERS INTERNATIONAL.short_description: Crisis Inc. challenges newly promoted department heads to solve evolving company crises with creativity, strategy, and teamwork—think fast, lead wisely, and outsmart the crisis!

IEEE WOMEN IN ENGINEERING (IEEE-WIE).name: Bot or Not
IEEE WOMEN IN ENGINEERING (IEEE-WIE).description: Bot or Not is a high-energy workshop on deepfake detection. Using Python, TensorFlow, and CNNs, you’ll uncover how AI fakes are made and learn to spot them. From real datasets to building your own model, you’ll gain practical skills, a working project, and sharper instincts for distinguishing real from fake.
IEEE WOMEN IN ENGINEERING (IEEE-WIE).short_description: Bot or Not: A hands-on workshop to detect deepfakes using Python, TensorFlow, and CNNs with real datasets.
IEEE WOMEN IN ENGINEERING (IEEE-WIE).tagline: Fake it till you break it — deepfake detection made real.

IEEE WOMEN IN ENGINEERING (IEEE-WIE).name: Switchuation 2.0
IEEE WOMEN IN ENGINEERING (IEEE-WIE).description: Switchuation 2.0 is a unique WebDev hackathon with a twist—teams swap project ideas at the start and build someone else’s vision. Blending web development with AI, it’s a fast-paced challenge of adaptability, creativity, and teamwork. Embrace new perspectives, think on your feet, and turn unfamiliar concepts into extraordinary creations. Step up, switch gears, and innovate.
IEEE WOMEN IN ENGINEERING (IEEE-WIE).short_description: Switchuation 2.0 is a WebDev hackathon where teams swap ideas, embracing AI, creativity, and collaboration to build innovative projects.
IEEE WOMEN IN ENGINEERING (IEEE-WIE).tagline: One Team's start is another's finale .SWITCH, SHUFFLE AND SLAYYY

MOZILLA FIREFOX.name: PLAYNAMICS
MOZILLA FIREFOX.description: Playnamics is more than just a game development marathon ,it’s a high-energy creative playground where ideas turn into interactive realities. Across this action-packed event, you’ll dive deep into the exciting world of game creation through a perfect blend of learning, hands-on building, and collaboration. We’ve lined up inspiring speaker sessions featuring experts from entrepreneurship, technology, and design & storytelling. But it’s not all talk ,our hands-on workshop will guide you step-by-step through building your own game, from brainstorming and prototyping to polishing gameplay and visuals. You’ll team up with fellow participants to brainstorm wild ideas, solve creative challenges, and bring your vision to life. Whether you’re just starting out or already have a few game projects under your belt, Playnamics is your chance to learn new skills, unleash your creativity, and connect with a community of passionate makers , all in an atmosphere buzzing with innovation and fun.
MOZILLA FIREFOX.short_description:
Playnamics is a game development workshop , a creative playground where participants can learn, build, and experience the process of making a game from scratch along with their friends. Mentors and two expert speakers will be there as ultimate power-ups,
 helping to level up skills and ideas.

MOZILLA FIREFOX.name: CodeXcape
MOZILLA FIREFOX.description: CodeXcape is an enthralling 24 Hour event that will have three unique and exciting rounds. Jeopardy - The Trivia Round. Scotland Yard - The Strategy Round. Hackathon - The Innovation Round. The Jeopardy Round will have 5-10 Questions per team that will be divided into 5 levels of difficulties ranging from very easy to very challenging. Right answers will gain the teams MozCoins depending on the level of difficulty of the question and an appropriate MozCoins deduction will be made for every wrong answer as well. Once the Jeopardy round is over we will move into the Scotland Yard round which will have multiple lobbies and each lobby will have 6 teams. 5 detective teams and 1 Mr.X (Imposter) team. The imposter's location will be revealed every 5 moves and based on that the detectives are supposed to track Mr.X. Based on how close each detective is to Mr.X , they get some amount of MozCoins and the same goes for Mr.X. Mr.X gains MozCoins for how far away from the detectives he is. The detectives and Mr.X also have the opportunity to spend points in round 2. Detectives can use MozCoins to know the location of Mr.X at any move and Mr.X can use MozCoins to warp to some preset location if he knows the detectives are close. The showpiece round is the hackathon which will be a unique take on hackathons. The teams will have randomised problem statements. They can change their problem statement to some other random problem statement by spending MozCoins. Other than this there will be several ways to spend MozCoins in the hackathon like mentorship and time extensions. The final marking will be accounted by hackathon for 80% and 20% by the remainder of MozCoins left in their account
MOZILLA FIREFOX.short_description: CodeXcape is an enthralling 24-hour competition structured around three distinct rounds and a strategic currency called MozCoins. The event begins with a trivia round, "Jeopardy," where teams accumulate MozCoins by correctly answering questions of varying difficulty. Next, in the "Scotland Yard" strategy round, teams play as detectives or an imposter, earning coins based on their ability to track or evade, and can spend them on tactical advantages. The final and main event is the Hackathon, where teams use their accumulated MozCoins to purchase critical resources like new problem statements, mentorship, or time extensions. A team's final victory is calculated with the hackathon project heavily weighted at 80% of the score, while their leftover MozCoins account for the remaining 20%.
MOZILLA FIREFOX.tagline: Outwit with trivia, outplay with strategy, and out-code the competition in 24 hours.

MUSIC CLUB.name: Right! A Tune
MUSIC CLUB.description:
The Music Club, an elite club at VIT, is home to some of the most talented musicians
who bring together "Right! A Tune," an opportunity-rich flagship event that
blends technology, music production, and performance all in one with an
additional Music Production Workshop on the first day.
This is a song-creation competitive hackathon with a cash prize for the top 3 winners.
The participants may participate solo, in a pair or as a team. They can find their collaborations before or during the event.
Spanning 48 hours, "Right! A Tune" is a dream come true for aspiring producers looking for the right opportunity to learn, connect and create music they love. Participants form teams, write, arrange and produce their own music from scratch. The best part? Their work gets released on Spotify, Apple Music and other major digital streaming platforms.
MUSIC CLUB.short_description: A 48 Hour Overnight Music Production hackathon focused on music enthusiasts who want to bring their musical creativity to life. Participants may find collaborators and form teams to write, record and mix their original songs. The Music Club will also host a music production workshop from industry level expert. Winners may receive cash prizes.

ROTARACT CLUB.name: Ignition'25
ROTARACT CLUB.description: Ignition’25 is a fast-paced ideathon that fuses strategy games with real-world problem-solving. From hyperlink races on Wikipedia to innovation challenges and idea pitches, teams will battle it out for the title of Ignition’25 Champions.
ROTARACT CLUB.short_description: Ignition’25 is a thrilling ideathon blending strategy games and innovation challenges, where teams compete creatively to become ultimate champions.

VIT SPARTANS.name: Battle in Borderland
VIT SPARTANS.description: Teams battle through four thrilling rounds: escape a clue-filled room in 10 minutes, race sequentially in the Wikipedia Relay where the slowest team is cut, crack hidden codes to stop a ticking bomb, and finally face the Split or Steal showdown—where trust, bluff, and strategy decide whether teams share glory, seize it all, or lose everything.
VIT SPARTANS.short_description: Escape rooms, relay races, code-breaking, and a final trust showdown—four thrilling rounds testing teamwork, speed, logic, and strategy
VIT SPARTANS.tagline: From secrets to strategy, speed to psychology — only the sharpest team survives all.

IEEE-MICROWAVE THEORY AND TECHNIQUES SOC.name: Techno Treasure Hunt : RF Rescue Edition
IEEE-MICROWAVE THEORY AND TECHNIQUES SOC.description: RF Rescue Edition is an exciting team-based treasure hunt where players solve RF and microwave-themed puzzles to unlock hidden clues. Teams of 3-5 race across 5–7 clue stations, cracking codes, scanning QR hints, and decoding signals. The adventure culminates in a final mission: restoring the lab by defeating signal interference through teamwork, logic, and discovery.
IEEE-MICROWAVE THEORY AND TECHNIQUES SOC.short_description: RF Rescue Edition: A campus treasure hunt where teams decode RF puzzles, chase clues, and save the lab from signal interference.

IEEE-MICROWAVE THEORY AND TECHNIQUES SOC.name: Beat The Jammer
IEEE-MICROWAVE THEORY AND TECHNIQUES SOC.description: Beat the Jammer is a fast-paced, tech-inspired game where teams race to locate the strongest music signal while a jammer blasts noise to block it. Players rotate as hider, jammer, and seekers, using sharp listening and quick moves. Bonus puzzles and tricky twists like moving jammers or blindfolds make it a fun mix of sound hunt and strategy.
IEEE-MICROWAVE THEORY AND TECHNIQUES SOC.short_description: Beat the Jammer: A fun sound-hunt game of signals, noise, strategy, puzzles, and twists.
IEEE-MICROWAVE THEORY AND TECHNIQUES SOC.tagline: Outsmart the static, chase the sound.

CULINARY CLUB.name: Purble Place
CULINARY CLUB.description:
Purble Place is a light-hearted and engaging competition that brings out the creativity of participants through the art of cake decorating. Designed as a casual yet skillful event, it encourages participants to experiment with color theory, design, and presentation while working under constraints that add an exciting challenge.
 Each team will be provided with a plain cake base along with a limited set of basic cream colors. Using these, they must decorate their cakes into an imaginative and visually appealing art piece. Since only primary colors will be supplied, participants will need to mix and experiment to generate additional colors, thereby testing both their creativity and practical understanding of color blending.
 The event will be conducted in two slots to ensure that all participants have adequate time and space to work comfortably. Within their given time frame, participants will plan, design, and execute their cake decoration.
CULINARY CLUB.short_description: Purble Place is a cake decorating event that encourages participants to experiment with color theory. Each team will be provided with a plain cake base along with a limited set of basic cream colors. Within their given time frame, participants will plan, design, and execute their cake decoration.

CULINARY CLUB.name: Byte to Bite
CULINARY CLUB.description:
BYTE TO BITE is a three-round event that brings together the worlds of artificial intelligence and culinary art. Participants will be challenged to think creatively and technically as they first code a smart system to generate a recipe and then cook that exact dish using real ingredients. 
 
 ROUND 1: AI MODELING
 small workshop to help the participants understand the steps to creating their own wrapper model, and an introduction to prompt engineering, as well as providing extra resources to help them
 ROUND 2: RECIPE RENDER 
 this round gives the participants time to create their own wrapper 
 ROUND 3: FROM SCRIPT TO SKILLET
 The participants would be provided with a mystery box with some random ingredients and using their made wrapper, they must generate a recipe which then has to be recreated by the participants
CULINARY CLUB.short_description: BYTE TO BITE is the ultimate tech-culinary challenge where code meets cuisine. Participants will be taught the basics of AI Wrappers and prompt engineering, and then Participants will have to build their own AI recipe generator, then use their custom model to create a unique dish from a mystery box of ingredients. It's a true test of skill, from script to skillet!

STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.name: Into the Micro-Verse
STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.description: Into the Micro-Verse is an interactive strategy game where players guide microbial teams through survival challenges. Stages include Immune Evasion, Antibiotic Resistance, Metabolic Rewiring, and CRISPR-Phage Defence. Side quests provide boosts like cloaks, resistance genes, or shields. Every decision shapes the final “evolved” microbe. Blending science, creativity, and competition, Micro-Verse makes adaptation the key to victory.
STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.club: SABEST (Students’ Association of Bio-Engineering Sciences and Technology
STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.short_description: Into the Micro-Verse is a competitive simulation where players engineer microbial survival by strategizing immune evasion, antibiotic resistance, metabolic rewiring, and CRISPR-based phage defence.

STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.name: Forensic Minds
STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.description: Forensic Minds is an immersive hands-on murder mystery workshop where participants become investigators, analyzing evidence with real forensic techniques like gel electrophoresis, blood typing, and more. Each experiment reveals vital clues, demanding logic, teamwork, and reasoning. Blending science with mystery, the workshop challenges participants to uncover motives, identify suspects, and solve the case in a thrilling race against time.
STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.club: SABEST (Students’ Association of Bio-Engineering Sciences and Technology)
STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.short_description: Forensic Minds is a hands-on workshop where participants investigate murder mysteries using forensic science, solving cases through experiments, logic, and teamwork.
STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.tagline: Trust the Science. Question everything else.

STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.name: LIGHTS OUT
STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.description: Lights Out is a high-octane, bio-inspired motorsport challenge blending Formula 1 with nature’s genius. Teams tackle four thrilling stages—BioRevamp, Pitstop Gauntlet, BioAuction, and the Grand Prix Showdown—reimagining flawed F1 designs with biomimicry, surviving high-speed relays, gambling biocoins on upgrades, and unveiling bold, nature-powered race machines. Innovation, strategy, and adrenaline collide—when the lights go out, the game begins.
STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.club: SABEST (Students' Association of Bio-Engineering Sciences and Technology)
STUDENTS ASSOCIATION OF BIO-ENGINEERING.short_description: Lights Out fuses Formula 1 with nature—biomimicry, strategy, and adrenaline drive teams through four thrilling, high-stakes stages.

INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERS INDIA IE(I).name: Hackatopia
INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERS INDIA IE(I).description: An ideathon where participants transform their ideas into basic project structures—such as simple web prototypes—and then get the chance to pitch them on stage. The event is designed to give maximum participants this opportunity, encouraging not just coding but also creativity, clarity, and entrepreneurial thinking. By blending innovation with presentation, it aims to spark an entrepreneurial mindset, motivating participants to see their ideas as potential startups while providing a fun, collaborative, and pitch-driven environment
INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERS INDIA IE(I).short_description: An ideathon where participants build prototypes, pitch ideas, and ignite entrepreneurial thinking in a creative, collaborative, and fun environment.
INSTITUTION OF ENGINEERS INDIA IE(I).tagline: Where every idea gets a voice

ANIMATION CLUB.name: Pixelens
ANIMATION CLUB.description: Join us for a 10-hour immersive workshop where creativity meets technology! Guided by an expert animator, participants will explore storytelling, character creation, and visual development while mastering Blender’s powerful tools for modeling, animation, and rendering. From concept to screen, learn the complete workflow of producing an animated film. Perfect for beginners and aspiring filmmakers alike!
ANIMATION CLUB.short_description: A 10-hour workshop blending storytelling and Blender skills—learn to craft, animate, and render your own animated film.

THE CATALYST CLUB.name: The Last Experiment!
THE CATALYST CLUB.description:
Unravel a chilling mystery at Murder at the Molecular Lab! 
 Dr. Aurelia Sparks has been found dead before presenting her breakthrough fuel formula.
 Teams race against time to solve chemistry-based puzzles and expose the killer.
 10 minutes, 4 suspects, 1 deadly chemical — can you crack the case?
THE CATALYST CLUB.short_description: Unravel a thrilling lab mystery! Solve chemistry puzzles, interrogate suspects, and race against time to expose Dr. Sparks’ killer.

NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF STUDENTS OF ARCH.name: Painted Panes
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF STUDENTS OF ARCH.description:
The Painted Panes Workshop invites participants to explore the art of transforming plain glass into striking, decorative pieces.
 
 Designed for beginners and art enthusiasts alike, the session introduces simple techniques and creative approaches that bring colours and patterns to life. 
 
 It offers a hands-on experience that combines learning with creativity, allowing participants to craft unique designs that reflect their personal style.
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF STUDENTS OF ARCH.club: National Association of Students of Architecture (NASA)
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF STUDENTS OF ARCH.short_description: Brighten your day at Painted Panes! Learn fun, easy glass-painting techniques to create vibrant, customised art pieces!
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF STUDENTS OF ARCH.tagline: Don’t be shy! Dive in and just pane it bright !

TECHNOLOGY AND GAMING CLUB (TAG).name: DESYNC X BGMI (TAG)
TECHNOLOGY AND GAMING CLUB (TAG).description: Battlegrounds Mobile India (BGMI) is a mobile battle royale game exclusive to Indian players, developed by Krafton. Up to 64 players parachute onto diverse maps, gather weapons, and compete to be the last one standing. BGMI features solo and squad modes, strategic gameplay, frequent events, and regular updates for immersive action in a fast-paced, shrinking battlefield
TECHNOLOGY AND GAMING CLUB (TAG).short_description: Battlegrounds Mobile India (BGMI) delivers thrilling battle royale action, where 64 players compete in intense, fast-paced survival matches. Play, fight, and conquer!
TECHNOLOGY AND GAMING CLUB (TAG).tagline: Enter The Glitch. Embrace The Chaos

INDIAN CONCRETE INSTITUTE.name: Squid Game: The Final Showdown

NATIONAL SERVICE SCHEME (NSS).description: Discover the joy of pottery in this hands-on workshop-no prior experience needed! Learn clay preparation, wheel techniques, and shaping methods from skilled instructors. Then, unleash your creativity to craft your own unique piece on the pottery wheel. Take home your handmade creation as a personal keepsake and a reminder of your artistic journey.

NATIONAL SERVICE SCHEME (NSS).name: Frame it with Figma
NATIONAL SERVICE SCHEME (NSS).description: "Join this hands-on workshop, open to everyone with no prior design experience! In Session 1, learn Figma to create wireframes, mockups, and prototypes with real-time collaboration. In Session 2, apply your skills to design a full UI for a web or mobile app. Win exciting cash prizes and earn a certificate of participation!"

SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHE.name: Math Premier League (MPL)
SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHE.description: Math Premier League (MPL) is a thrilling 3 round team event mixing tech, logic, and adrenaline! Begin with a coding round to showcase programming skills, dash through a puzzle packed Treasure Hunt, and finish with the high stakes Jeopardy quiz where wit and knowledge decide the winner. From coding to clue chasing to quizzes, MPL is the arena to code, hunt, and conquer.

SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHE.short_description: Math Premier League brings coding, puzzles, and quizzes together in a 3 round team event where teamwork, speed, and logic conquer.

SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHE.name: Hackulus
SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHE.description:
"Hackulus 2025 is an exhilarating 24-hour hackathon organised by the Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (SIAM) at VIT Vellore. This edition promises to be bigger and better, featuring 7 diverse tracks and expecting a turnout of 400–500 talented participants from across the country.
The hackathon aims to foster innovation and creativity, bringing together passionate individuals to develop impactful solutions to real-world challenges. Participants will compete across domains such as AI & Mathematical Modelling, Healthcare, Fintech, Open Innovation, VIT Centric and more, working under the continuous mentorship of industry experts and guided by cutting-edge insights.
Hackulus is not just a hackathon, it’s a platform to innovate, collaborate, and transform ideas into reality. By connecting students, professionals, and industry leaders, the event provides participants with exposure, networking opportunities, and the chance to showcase their skills to potential recruiters and sponsors. With its focus on technological advancement and community-driven problem-solving, Hackulus 2025 promises to deliver an unparalleled learning and innovation experience."
SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHE.club: SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHEMATICS (SIAM)
SOCIETY FOR INDUSTRIAL AND APPLIED MATHE.short_description: Hackulus is an exciting 24-hour hackathon organised by SIAM, VIT Vellore, bringing together 400–500 innovators across 7 diverse tracks. With expert mentorship and endless creativity, participants will develop real-world solutions to tackle today’s biggest challenges.

THE BIOTECH RESEARCH SOCIETY INDIA (BRSI.name: Season Zero
THE BIOTECH RESEARCH SOCIETY INDIA (BRSI.description:
Step into Season Zero, where your favorite shows and movies come alive in a game like no other. Navigate through 3 rooms, each packed with challenges inspired by F.R.I.E.N.D.S, Brooklyn 99, The Conjuring, and Interstellar. Solve puzzles, laugh, get a little spooked, and test your wits at every turn.

Only the cleverest and quickest will make it through all rooms. Bring your friends, enjoy the twists, and aim to be the one winner who conquers all 4 shows. Fun, surprises, and a little madness await — are you ready to play?
THE BIOTECH RESEARCH SOCIETY INDIA (BRSI.short_description: Season Zero is a multi-round event reimagining Netflix hits as immersive challenges, blending puzzles, suspense, and fun-filled competition.

THE BIOTECH RESEARCH SOCIETY INDIA (BRSI.name: CRISPRverse
THE BIOTECH RESEARCH SOCIETY INDIA (BRSI.description: CRISPRverse is a challenge-driven event where participants experience genome editing through competitive, hands-on tasks. Starting with guided workshops, teams design CRISPR strategies, tackle knockout vs. knock-in decisions, and simulate editing results. Advancing through rounds, they present complete pipelines to judges. By combining training, competition, and creativity, CRISPRverse offers an engaging platform to learn, apply, and showcase CRISPR innovation.
THE BIOTECH RESEARCH SOCIETY INDIA (BRSI.short_description: CRISPRverse is a competitive, hands-on event where teams design, simulate, and present CRISPR genome editing solutions from start to finish.

VINNOVATEIT CLUB.name: Vinhack
VINNOVATEIT CLUB.description:
The flagship hackathon of VinnovateIT is back... bigger, bolder, and built for the future. This isn’t just a hackathon; it’s your invitation to step into the tech renaissance, a revival of creativity, collaboration, and groundbreaking technology.

For 36 hours, innovators, developers, and creators will collaborate to turn daring ideas into real solutions. Armed with open-source tools, participants will dive deep into AI models, blockchain, VR/AR, gaming engines, IoT ecosystems, and cloud-native frameworks building projects that push the boundaries of what’s possible.

Tracks span across AI, IoT, Gaming, Sustainability, and Futuristic Tech, giving teams the freedom to explore, experiment, and disrupt. From immersive virtual worlds and autonomous systems to decentralized apps and sustainable tech, VinHack challenges you to imagine big and build bigger.

With expert mentors, cutting-edge resources, and a community of bold thinkers, VinHack is more than a competition, it’s a launchpad for the next generation of innovation.

Build. Share. Redefine the future.
VINNOVATEIT CLUB.short_description:
36 hours. Limitless innovation.
The flagship hackathon of VinnovateIT is back, bigger, bolder, and powered by open-source tools. Build disruptive solutions with AI, blockchain, VR/AR, gaming engines, IoT, and cloud-native frameworks. From virtual worlds to autonomous systems and decentralized apps, VinHack is where bold ideas become next-gen products.

ADDITIVE MANUFACTURING SOCIETY OF INDIA.name: 3D Quest
ADDITIVE MANUFACTURING SOCIETY OF INDIA.description: Get ready for an adrenaline-charged treasure hunt as two teams of 3–5 participants race against the clock! Each team will solve clever clues to discover hidden 3D printed puzzle pieces scattered across the iconic stretch from CDMM to SMV. With just 30 minutes to crack the code and complete the puzzle, only one team will claim victory and take home a unique 3D printed prize. Every second counts—will your team rise to the challenge and outsmart the competition?

ADDITIVE MANUFACTURING SOCIETY OF INDIA.short_description: Two teams race simultaneously against the clock, collecting and assembling parts. Winner takes it all.

ANCHORING CLUB.name: The Tech Traitors Masquerade
ANCHORING CLUB.description:
The Tech Traitors Masquerade is a high stakes deception game where players slip into secret roles as Faithfuls or Traitors. Faithfuls race to crack tech themed challenges such as coding puzzles, bug hunts and trivia while Traitors lurk in disguise, subtly sabotaging their progress.
 With a virtual spotlight on participants each round, it is a battle of suspicion, strategy and logic to decide who survives and who gets unmasked.

ANCHORING CLUB.name: Voices Unplugged
ANCHORING CLUB.description: “Voices Unplugged,” organized by the VIT Anchoring Club, is a three-hour interactive workshop introducing school students to the art of public speaking. Guided by experienced mentors, participants will explore voice modulation, body language, confidence-building, and storytelling through engaging games, exercises, and challenges. Designed to break stage fear, the workshop nurtures leadership, communication skills, and confidence for future opportunities.

THE ELECTRONICS CLUB (TEC).name: SENSORED X
THE ELECTRONICS CLUB (TEC).description: SENSORED X is an electrifying 2-day overnight experience where curiosity meets creation!  On Day 1, dive into the world of sensors and microcontrollers—master breadboard wiring, circuit assembly, and component handling while working hands-on with 10 real components (yours to keep!). On Day 2, step into the Mystery Box Challenge —unbox hidden sensors, decode their purpose, design a prototype, and pitch your solution to claim the prize pool of ₹5000 ! More than just a workshop, SENSORED X is a journey of learning, building, and competing—an unforgettable celebration of innovation, teamwork, and the spirit of electronics. 🚀

Our workshop offers exclusive free access to Twinsimulate, empowering you with real-time microcontroller simulation and hands-on learning. Join us to unlock faster design, smarter debugging, and cutting-edge expertise your gateway to the future of embedded systems. Register now to lead tomorrow’s technology.

THE SOCIETY OF PETROLEUM ENGINEERS (SPE).name: THE CARTER CONSPIRACY
THE SOCIETY OF PETROLEUM ENGINEERS (SPE).description: Dr. Benjamin Carter, a renowned chemical researcher, is mysteriously found dead in his laboratory. Whispers suggest he was on the brink of synthesizing a volatile formula. Was it scientific failure—or calculated murder? Teams must decode cryptic clues across 8 campus sites, recover 5 critical components, and navigate Carter’s experimental escape lab to unravel the conspiracy and expose the culprit.
THE SOCIETY OF PETROLEUM ENGINEERS (SPE).short_description: Dr. Carter’s dead. A conspiracy brews. Race across campus, crack clues, and escape the lab before time runs out.

VIT MATHEMATICAL ASSOCIATION (VITMAS).name: Modelling Minds
VIT MATHEMATICAL ASSOCIATION (VITMAS).description:
Modelling Minds is an overnight machine learning hackathon where participants (solo or in teams of up to 3) clean, preprocess, and build ML models on curated datasets. Models are evaluated on hidden test data based on multiple performance metrics.

Designed for both beginners and enthusiasts, this event tests real-world problem-solving, optimization under time pressure, and practical data intuition — all in a competitive yet fun environment! A special intro session will be conducted at the start to guide beginners through ML basics before they dive into the hackathon and compete for prizes.
VIT MATHEMATICAL ASSOCIATION (VITMAS).short_description: Modelling Minds is a hands-on ML challenge where participants clean, preprocess, and build models using real-world datasets.

PlaceIT empowers students to transform ideas into reality, fostering creativity, curiosity, and innovation in a collaborative environment.
IEEE PROFESSIONAL COMMUNICATION SOCIETY.short_description: PlaceIT sparks innovation in Web, Cybersecurity, AI/ML, and IoT, fostering teamwork, creativity, and impactful idea transformation.

BULLS AND BEARS CLUB.name: CASHFLOW 4.0
BULLS AND BEARS CLUB.description:
"Cashflow 4.0 – a thrilling financial simulation where you don’t just play a game, you live the life of an investor. Participants start with a virtual wallet and step into a world of incomes, expenses, assets, and liabilities, just like in real life. The goal? Build enough passive income to escape the rat race and race toward financial freedom.

But beware—it’s not a smooth ride. Along the way, you’ll face market swings, surprise windfalls, sudden raids, and even the risk of bankruptcy. One smart investment could multiply your wealth, while one wrong move could wipe you out. With every turn, you’ll trade, negotiate, and outwit rivals to stay ahead.

Cashflow 4.0 is more than a board game—it’s a high-speed battlefield of strategy, wit, and decision-making. Adapt to the chaos, manage your resources, and play your moves wisely, because in the end, only the most strategic mind will claim financial victory."
BULLS AND BEARS CLUB.short_description: Cashflow 4.0 – Where money moves fast and fortunes flip! Invest, trade, and outsmart rivals as raids, bankruptcies, and market twists strike without warning. Escape the rat race—or get crushed in it.
BULLS AND BEARS CLUB.tagline: Turn Dice into Dollars, Dreams into Destiny.

CYCLING CLUB.name: Cyclomania
CYCLING CLUB.description: Go beyond a simple race in Cyclomania, the ultimate team cycling showdown! Tackle three thrilling events: repair a cycle against the clock, race with water in a high-energy relay, and combine speed with accuracy in a precision time trial. This competition tests teamwork, strategy, and versatility, pushing teams to their limits to crown the true Cyclomania Champions.
CYCLING CLUB.short_description: Cyclomania is an adrenaline-fueled team cycling challenge testing repair, relay, and precision skills in three unique, reality-show style events.
CYCLING CLUB.tagline: Fix, flow, and go – only the fastest team steals the show.

CYCLING CLUB.name: GlowRide
CYCLING CLUB.description:
Get ready to experience the city like never before! Glow Ride 2025 is an enchanting night-time cyclothon that combines fitness, fun, and festivity into one unforgettable evening. As the sun sets and the streets come alive, join us for a dazzling ride under the stars, where every turn of the pedal will be lit with brilliance, energy, and excitement.

This unique event is designed to light up the night—literally! With cycles provided for participants, you won’t need to worry about bringing your own gear. Adorned with glowing lights and glitter, the ride will create a spectacular trail of luminescence, turning the road into a vibrant celebration of motion and color.

Whether you’re a cycling enthusiast, a fitness lover, or simply someone who enjoys unforgettable experiences, Glow Ride promises the perfect blend of adventure and atmosphere. Imagine cruising through the night breeze, surrounded by a sea of glowing bicycles, laughter, and cheers—a true festival on wheels!
CYCLING CLUB.short_description:
Glow Ride 2025 is a vibrant night-time cyclothon where fitness meets festivity. With cycles provided for participants, the event transforms the streets into a glowing trail of lights, glitter, and energy. Join us for an unforgettable evening ride under the stars and be part of a community celebration that blends health, fun, and radiance.
short event description

SOFT COMPUTING RESEARCH SOCIETY (SCRS).name: ESCAPE.EXE II
SOFT COMPUTING RESEARCH SOCIETY (SCRS).description:
Escape.exe II, the thrilling sequel to last year’s hit escape room. This time, the mystery is deadlier, the puzzles tougher, and the story darker.
 Participants will enter a fully immersive darkened space divided into four suspense-filled zones, each packed with chilling clues, intricate puzzles, and hidden secrets. Every solved challenge brings players closer to unmasking the murderer before time runs out.
 Blending suspense, teamwork, and critical thinking, Escape.exe II offers a gripping experience that tests logic and collaboration while keeping participants on edge till the very end.
SOFT COMPUTING RESEARCH SOCIETY (SCRS).short_description: Escape.exe II: Darker, deadlier, tougher puzzles — solve mysteries, uncover secrets, and escape before time runs out!
SOFT COMPUTING RESEARCH SOCIETY (SCRS).tagline: When you’ve found the light, beware of the shadows it leaves behind.

DANCE CLUB.name: Grooveathon
DANCE CLUB.description:
A lively competition where teams create choreography in real time, combining creativity with technical skill.
Phase 1 (DAY 1): QR CODE SCAVENGER HUNT 
All teams, made up of 8 members, come together for a mini QR code hunt on the first day of the event. After finishing the hunt, teams will receive their theme and their technical challenge, which they must include in their choreography. 

Phase 2 (DAY 1): Theme Evaluation (Review 1) 
Judges will assess how well teams express the given theme and challenges in their performances. 

Phase 3 (DAY 1): The Prop Allotment 
Right after the first review, each team receives a prop they must creatively add to their existing routine. 

Phase 4 (DAY 2): Rhythm Lab 
Teams move into a focused rehearsal stage to refine movements, improve transitions, and strengthen coordination to make sure their performance reflects the essence of the theme. 

Phase 5 (DAY 2): Elimination Round (Review 2) 
Teams perform half of their routine, including the prop in their choreography. This is an elimination round. 

DAY 3- 
The Final Showcase: All finalists perform one last time (the entire set lasting between 2:30 and 3 minutes) for the judges, who will score them and crown the champion.
DANCE CLUB.short_description: The competition kicks off with a QR Code Hunt, unveiling hidden themes and code snippets that inspire dynamic dance challenges. Teams incorporate surprise props, choreographic twists, and stunning effects, clashing in creative face-offs before showcasing their finest performances in a spectacular grand finale.

DANCE CLUB.name: Step Up Stars
DANCE CLUB.description:
The Dance Workshop is an exclusive opportunity for students of Grades 6–12 to experience dance in a vibrant setting. 

In this workshop, students will:

Learn a new freestyle choreography blending multiple dance styles( 7 different teams housed by the VIT dance club), set to age-appropriate music.
Be guided by professional and experienced choreographers in a beginner-friendly format, and volunteers who will be present throughout the session for appropriate guidance and teaching. 
Participate in a 2 hour session that includes short interactive games to create a fun, engaging, and collaborative environment.

The workshop is designed not only to teach dance but also to encourage creativity, confidence, and an enjoyable learning experience within the energetic atmosphere of GraVITas.
DANCE CLUB.short_description: A 2-hour beginner-friendly dance workshop for students of Grades 6–12 during GraVITas. Participants will learn freestyle choreography on trendy, age-appropriate songs through interactive and engaging sessions conducted by trained choreographers.
DANCE CLUB.tagline: Where every step makes u shine

GOOGLE DEVELOPERS STUDENT CLUB (GDSC).name: DevJams
GOOGLE DEVELOPERS STUDENT CLUB (GDSC).description:
DevJams is a high-energy, 48-hour hackathon where innovators, problem-solvers, and tech enthusiasts come together to turn bold ideas into impactful solutions. Open to both beginners and seasoned developers, the event is designed to challenge creativity, sharpen technical skills, and foster collaboration.

Over the past seven editions, DevJams has evolved into a landmark event for the GDSC community, drawing participants from across the country. This September, the 8th edition will once again provide a space where diverse minds converge, building projects that push boundaries, solve real problems, and inspire the next wave of innovation.
GOOGLE DEVELOPERS STUDENT CLUB (GDSC).short_description: DevJams is a 48-hour hackathon where beginners and pros come together to build bold, impactful solutions. Now in its 8th edition, it’s a landmark GDSC event that sparks creativity, collaboration, and real-world innovation. Checkout the Website at  [DevJams'25](https://devjams.dscvit.com?utm_source=Gravitas&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=Event_Description)

ASTRONOMY CLUB- VIT STELLAR.name: Celestial Dive 4.0
ASTRONOMY CLUB- VIT STELLAR.description: Celestial Dive 4.0 is VIT-Stellar's annual overnight stargazing event, held as part of Gravitas in collaboration with Space India. Hosted at KC Lawn, the event features live celestial observations through professional telescopes, guided workshops on astronomy and telescope handling, and interactive discussions on space science. It offers participants a hands-on opportunity to explore planets, nebulae, and star clusters while deepening their understanding of the night sky.
ASTRONOMY CLUB- VIT STELLAR.short_description: Celestial Dive 4.0 invites astronomy enthusiasts for an unforgettable overnight experience under the stars. Witness the wonders of the night sky through powerful telescopes, accompanied by engaging educational talks that explore celestial mysteries and ignite cosmic curiosity.
ASTRONOMY CLUB- VIT STELLAR.tagline: Zooming into the cosmos to witness the wonders of stars, planets, and galaxies.

ASTRONOMY CLUB- VIT STELLAR.name: Aerovate 2.0
ASTRONOMY CLUB- VIT STELLAR.description: Aerovate 2.0 is VIT-Stellar's two-day rocketry event, conducted in collaboration with Thrust Tech India. Day 1 features an intensive workshop on rocketry fundamentals, including simulations, design principles, and hands-on construction of prototype rockets by participating teams. On Day 2, teams will launch their rockets at SJT Ground, testing their designs and applying the concepts learned. The event aims to provide a practical, engaging introduction to aerospace engineering and experimental rocketry
ASTRONOMY CLUB- VIT STELLAR.short_description: Aerovate 2.0 is a 2-day rocketry event by VIT-Stellar & Thrust Tech India, featuring a workshop on rocketry fundamentals & hands-on prototype building on Day 1, followed by rocket launches on Day 2.
ASTRONOMY CLUB- VIT STELLAR.tagline: Sky’s not the limit-it’s just the parking lot.

IEEE COMPUTER SOCIETY (IEEE-CS).description: This isn’t for you if you want hints or anything easy. WTF is IEEE-CS VIT’s high stakes technical Capture the Flag event for those who uncover vulnerabilities, outsmart systems, and think differently. Handcrafted challenges hide subtle flaws and clues across the internet. Every flag is concealed in plain sight or buried deep. Think fast. Dig deep. Chase the flag.
IEEE COMPUTER SOCIETY (IEEE-CS).short_description: WTF is a technical CTF event. Tackle web exploits, digital forensics, reverse engineering, and cybersecurity challenges to capture hidden flags.
IEEE COMPUTER SOCIETY (IEEE-CS).tagline: Nothing is random if you know where to look.

INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).name: Hackademia - College Survival Edition
INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).description: Hackademia – College Survival Edition is a student-focused hackathon where participants create clever, minimal yet impactful solutions for real campus-life struggles. With the theme “Less is More,” projects should be creative, practical, and relevant to student life — from mess menu predictions to clash-free timetables. Judging emphasizes creativity, usability, justified tech choices, and minimal but effective implementation.
INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).short_description: Hackademia – College Survival Edition challenges students to build minimal, clever tech solutions for real campus struggles, judged on creativity and usability.
INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).tagline: Less is More: innovate student life, one hack at a time

INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).name: Introduction to Linux
INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).description:
Linux is everywhere, from the servers powering the internet to embedded systems running in everyday devices. Yet, many still see it as a “complex” or “intimidating” platform. This session aims to break that barrier.

Through this hands-on workshop, participants will be introduced to the fundamentals of Linux: the philosophy that drives it, the structure of the operating system, and the essential commands that give users complete control over their machines. We will explore the Linux filesystem, process management, permissions, package management, and shell scripting basics. Along the way, attendees will gain practical experience navigating the command line and learn how Linux empowers developers, engineers, and innovators across the world.

Whether you’re a beginner curious about Linux, a developer looking to strengthen your foundation, or someone interested in exploring open-source, this workshop will equip you with the tools and mindset to get started.

By the end of the session, you’ll walk away not just knowing what Linux is, but also how to use it effectively.
INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).short_description: This hands-on session will introduce you to the Linux ecosystem, covering core commands, filesystem navigation, process management, and the open-source philosophy. Perfect for beginners and enthusiasts eager to explore the backbone of modern computing.

INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).name: Gamified 3.0
INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).description: Gamified 3.0 is a hands-on workshop where you explore the fundamentals of electronics and microcontrollers by building your own game controller. From circuit design and coding to wired and wireless communication, every step is interactive and engaging. By the end, you’ll not only gain practical skills but also take home a fully functional controller you built yourself!
INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).short_description: Dive into a hands-on workshop where you build your own game controller from scratch using microcontrollers. From circuits to wireless communication, code to debugging — every step is interactive and skill-packed. Walk away with a fully functional controller you created!
INTERNET OF THINGS COMMUNITY (IOTHINC).tagline: Your first step from gamer to maker

ANOKHA.name: The Silent Voice
ANOKHA.description: Ready to turn your ideas into a real-world impact? Join our Ideathon on Sign Language & Innovation for a full day of creativity, learning, and hands-on problem-solving. This is your chance to shine and build something truly meaningful. The event will kick off with an introduction, followed by a special guest speaker who will guide you through the world of sign language and its importance, giving you the foundational knowledge you need for the challenge. Then, the main event begins! You’ll work in teams to choose a problem domain and create an impactful solution (hardware or software). The top three teams will be awarded prizes and certificates, and all other participants will receive a certificate of participation. Join us and be a part of the future where innovation knows no limits!
ANOKHA.short_description: Get ready to make an impact! Join our Ideathon on Sign Language and Innovation for an exhilarating challenge that turns your ideas into reality. Compete for incredible prizes and build a solution that changes lives.

VIT AMATEUR RADIO CLUB (VARC).name: Operation signal chase
VIT AMATEUR RADIO CLUB (VARC).description:
Operation Signal Chase
 Embark on an adrenaline-filled treasure hunt as a rescue communications team! Decode Morse code clues from your hidden “radio operator,” navigate landmarks, and race across campus to find them. Beware of decoys — speed and accuracy are key. The first team to locate and “rescue” their missing member wins the mission!
VIT AMATEUR RADIO CLUB (VARC).short_description:
Operation Signal Chase
 Decode Morse clues, race across campus, outsmart decoys, and rescue your missing teammate before others do!
VIT AMATEUR RADIO CLUB (VARC).tagline: "Crack the Code. Track the Signal. Rescue to Win!"

VIT FILM SOCIETY (VFS).name: Mojo Unchained
VIT FILM SOCIETY (VFS).description: Step into the director’s chair and recreate your favorite movie scene in this ultimate showdown. Teams can remake any scene shot-for-shot or with creative twists—dubbed, lip-synced, DIY, or cinematic. Once the lights dim, every recreation hits the screen. Prizes await for Best Recreation, Props, Set, Dialogue, and more.
VIT FILM SOCIETY (VFS).short_description: Recreate iconic movie scenes—shot-for-shot or with twists. Dub, lip-sync, DIY props. Compete for Best Recreation, Props, Set, Dialogue.
VIT FILM SOCIETY (VFS).tagline: Lights, camera, freedom—the scene is yours.

IEEE SOCIETY ON SOCIAL IMPLICATIONS OF T.name: TEA TALK
IEEE SOCIETY ON SOCIAL IMPLICATIONS OF T.description:
When curiosity meets experience and questions spark revelations.

Join Striver, ex-Google engineer, entrepreneur building his own company, India’s top coding mentor with 1.5M+ followers, and renowned for placement-focused talks, the Vice President of AI and Data at Capgemini, and many more industry experts in a podcast-style conversation exploring the current job market, growth mindset, and entrepreneurship.

Real insights. Unfiltered perspectives. Open doubt-solving.
